Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on two unique targets in range, giving them an electric shock. Make two ranged attacks, dealing electric damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Zing Zap

Description: You focus all of your willpower into your head and ram it into a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 17 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Zen Headbutt

Description: You fire out an extreme blast of pure electric energy at a creature. Make a ranged attack against a target in range, doing electric damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Zap Cannon

Description: You release a big yawn that causes a creature to become very drowsy. Choose a target in range. If that target is still in the battle after the end of its next turn, it falls asleep.
name: Yawn

Description: You cross your claws for a scissor-like slashing attack. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing bug damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: X-Scissor

Description: You wrap your hands around the target and squeeze hard. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing normal damage on a hit. If the target has 50% or more of its maximum HP, double your move modifier for the damage roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Wring Out

Description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is grappled on your subsequent turns, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing normal damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Wrap

Description: You shoot a bizarre seed that implants worry into another creature. The target must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC or replace the user's choice of ability with "Insomnia", preventing sleep for the duration.
name: Worry Seed

Description: You get your adrenaline pumping and go into a frenzy. While worked up, you add +2 to all attack rolls. Your worked up status ends if you are incapacitated or if you have not attacked a hostile target since your last turn, or taken any damage since then.
name: Work Up

Description: You slam your rough body against a creature, taking serious recoil damage. Make an attack roll against a target, dealing grass damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the damage dealt in typeless recoil damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Wood Hammer

Description: You create a bizarre vibe in the air in a 100 foot circle, centered on you. For the duration, all WIS saves become CON saves and all CON saves become WIS saves.
name: Wonder Room

Description: When subject to a melee or ranged attack, you can spend your reaction to increase your AC by +2 if it would cause the attack to miss.
Scaling: Higher Levels: Increase your AC by +3 at level 10 and above.
name: Withdraw

Description: You send forth a healing wish that takes time to come true. At the end of your next turn, as a free action, heal a target in range for hit points.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Wish

Description: You strike out at a target creature with your wings. Make a melee attack roll, doing flying damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Wing Attack

Description: You send a sinister, white-hot flame at a creature attempting to inflict a burn. Make a ranged attack roll on a target, causing burn on a hit.
name: Will-O-Wisp

Description: You shroud yourself in electricity and charge at a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing electric damage on a hit, but taking 1/4 of the damage (rounded down) in typeless recoil.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Wild Charge

Description: You have the ability to guard your allies from area-of-effect moves. As a reaction, when a creature activates a damaging move that damages multiple allies within range, you may halve the damage dealt. On future instances of this reaction in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll or forfeit the reaction with no effect
name: Wide Guard

Description: You create a whirlwind of spinning air around you, increasing your AC by +2  until the beginning of your next turn. When you activate this move, any creature within 5 feet of you must succeed on a STR saving throw against your Move DC or fall prone. In wild creature battles, this move can be activated to automatically count as a single success in a group DEX check to run away.
name: Whirlwind

Description: You create a wave of water that swirls around a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll. On a hit, the target takes water damage and is restrained. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. On each successive turn, if the creature is still restrained, you may use this move again (as an action) and automatically hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Whirlpool

Description: You send a powerful ball of energy that changes type based on the surrounding weather, dealing damage of that type. |Weather|Type| |:--:|:--: |Harsh Sunlight|Fire |Rain|Water |Sandstorm|Rock |Hail or Snow|Ice |Foggy or Cloudy|Normal
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Weather Ball

Description: You create an intense waterfall that crashes down on creatures in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Creatures in the area must make a STR save against your Move DC or take water damage and fall prone on a fail, or half as much on a save.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Waterfall

Description: You fire a blast of water at a creature that increases in power the more healthy you are. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature, doing water damage on a hit if you are at or above 50% of your health. If you are below 50%, halve the total damage done.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Water Spout

Description: You soak yourself and all allies with water, reducing the amount of fire damage taken for anyone affected. For the duration, you and any ally in range (when you initially activated this move) have resistance to fire-type attacks. If you were already resistant, you are now immune. If you were vulnerable, you now take normal damage. If you are immune to fire-type moves already, nothing happens.
name: Water Sport

Description: You fire a barrage of sharp shurikens at a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another shuriken strikes the target for an additional water damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Water Shuriken

Description: You send a wave of ultrasonic aquatic energy at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing water damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 17 or higher, the target is confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Water Pulse

Description: You send a column of water towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing water damage on a hit. After you land a hit, any ally that uses another Pledge move in the same round automatically hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Water Pledge

Description: You fire a quick spurt of water at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Water Gun

Description: You attack with a jolting slap from your palms. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit. If the target is asleep, double your Move modifier when adding damage, but the target automatically wakes up.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Wake-Up Slap

Description: You rush forward in a flash of electricity with extended reach, slamming into a creature. When activating this move, you flash forward 15 feet and make a melee attack roll against a creature, dealing electric damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the total (rounded down) in typeless recoil damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Volt Tackle

Description: You lash out with a quick, electric strike before you make a getaway. Make a melee attack, dealing electric damage on a hit. After this move is activated, a trainer must switch out the user as a free action.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Volt Switch

Description: A slow fighting attack that pummels a creature. As an action on your turn, you hold this move until next turn, where it will automatically hit for fighting damage as long as the target remains in melee range.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Vital Throw

Description: You extend a sharp vine to whip the target with. This vine can strike anything within 15 feet of you. Make a melee attack roll, doing grass damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Vine Whip

Description: You crush a creature with a forceful, gripping attack. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit, grappling the target. On each successive turn, if the creature is still grappled, you may use this move again (as an action) and automatically hit. A creature may attempt to excape the grapple at the beginning of its turns with a STR save against your Move DC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Vice Grip

Description: You attempt to drench a creature in poisonous liquid. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing poison damage on a hit. If the target is already poisoned, double the dice roll for the damage
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Venoshock

Description: You drench a creature with an odd, poisonous liquid. Force a creature to make a CON save against your Move DC, becoming poisoned on a failure. If the target is already poisoned, this move automatically hits, causing the creature to now take double the base poison damage at the end of each of its turns.
name: Venom Drench

Description: You whirl your fists with a fast attack that pushes a quick burst of wind at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Vacuum Wave

Description: Your forehead burns like hot coals as you slam your head into a creature. Make a melee attack roll, dealing fire damage on a hit. After activating this move, your AC decreases by 2 until the beginning of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
name: V-Create

Description: You cause an uproar on the battlefield in a 60 foot circle, centered on you, for three rounds of combat. During the uproar, your action is spent continuing the move (without spending PP), and any creature in range wakes and is prevented from falling asleep. (This include creatures that would purposefully fall asleep using moves like Rest) In addition, creatures in the area at the start of their turns must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a fail, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Uproar

Description: You lash out with a quick strike before you make a getaway. Make a melee attack, dealing bug damage on a hit. After this move is activated, a trainer must switch out the user as a free action.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: U-Turn

Description: You send a gust of swirling wind that tears through a creature. Make a ranged attack on a creature, doing dragon damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 16 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Twister

Description: You fire two sharp projectiles at a creature in range. They do not have to target the same creature. Make two ranged attack rolls, dealing bug damage on each hit. If the natural roll of either attack is a 19 or 20, the target is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Twineedle

Description: You strike out with a blast of energy that increases in strength the more it is used. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing normal damage on a hit. Increase the damage by your Move modifier for each PP that has been expended for the move, before the move was activated. Using a restorative to regain PP resets the damage for this attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d8 at level 5, 2d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Trump Card

Description: You attempt to land an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. Make a melee attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. On a natural role of 16 or more, the target adds -1 to any attack it makes for the remainder of combat. This modifier can be stacked up to a maximum of -3.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Trop Kick

Description: You strike out with three consecutive kicks. Make three melee attack rolls in order, doing fighting damage on each hit. As soon as one attack misses, the move is over.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Triple Kick

Description: You move quickly to attempt to swap held items with a creature. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, swapping held items with them on a hit.
name: Trick

Description: You attempt to scare the spirit right out of a creature in range. Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, its type is changed to Ghost through their next three turns in battle.
name: Trick-or-Treat

Description: The world around you seems to spin for a moment, and the whole battlefield is hit with a bizarre feeling. Starting at the beginning of the next round of combat after you activate this move, the initiative order is permanently reversed.
name: Trick Room

Description: You strike with a simultaneous three-beam attack. Each creature in a 30 foot cone, centered on you, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a fail, and half as much on a success. Targets that fail the save by 5 or more must roll a d4, gaining the status condition as follows: 1. The target becomes burned. 2. The target becomes frozen. 3. The target becomes paralyzed. 4. Must reroll until any number other than 4 appears.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Tri Attack

Description: You attempt to morph into a near-exact copy of a creature in range. The base SR of the target must be able to be controlled by your trainer or the move fails. For the duration, you copy the target's type, ability scores, skills, speeds, senses, abilities, and current moves. You retain your own feats, level, and HP (Changed CON does not impact your HP).
name: Transform

Description: You send a downpour of potent, poisonous rain in a 5 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Targets in the area must make a CON save against your MOVE DC or become poisoned. Creatures poisoned by this move take double the normal poison damage.
name: Toxic

Description: You fire a collection of poisonous threads at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll against a target, covering them with threads on a hit. So long as the threads make contact with the target, the target is poisoned and its speed is reduced by 10. This move is stackable to any amount however the poison effect does not affect the target more than once. If this reduction in speed causes their speed to be 0, the target is restrained. The target may use an action to remove the threads from its body, healing the poisoned status.
name: Toxic Thread

Description: You quickly summon a trap of poisonous spikes around a creature that enters the battle. When a creature is switched into battle, you may use your reaction to force a creature to make a CON save against your Move DC, becoming poisoned on a failure.
name: Toxic Spikes

Description: You send a dark energy to torment a creature in range that attacks you. When hit by a melee or ranged attack, force the target to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target cannot use the same move that hit you on its next turn.
name: Torment

Description: You unleash a dark energy that has the power to reverse the stat changes of a creature. Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, any stat changes currently affecting the target have the opposite effect.
name: Topsy-Turvy

Description: You turn your melee attack into a playful tickle. As a bonus action at the end of a turn in which you used a melee attack, force a creature to make a CON saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target flinches.
name: Tickle

Description: You send a powerful bolt of electricity at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing electric damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Thunderbolt

Description: Powerful electric energy arcs out from you, hitting any creature in a 20 foot radius, centered on you. Creatures caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking electric damage on a fail, and half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the saving throw by 5 or more become paralyzed. Creatures in range that are in flight or in the invulnerable stage of Fly or Bounce take double damage from this move.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Thunder

Description: You send a wave of electric energy that surrounds a creature in range. The target must make a CON save against your Move DC or become paralyzed.
name: Thunder Wave

Description: You deliver an electric shock to a target in range. Make a ranged attack, doing electric damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Thunder Shock

Description: Your punches are imbued with electric energy. Make a melee attack on a target, doing electric damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Thunder Punch

Description: You attempt to pierce a creature with electric fangs. Make a melee attack, dealing electric damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is paralyzed and flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Thunder Fang

Description: You focus in on an attack at the target's throat. Make a melee attack, dealing dark damage on a hit. On hit, the target is unable to activate sound based attacks for its next turns.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Throat Chop

Description: You thrash about wildly, doing several attacks without control. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of two additional hits. At the end of this attack, you become confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d8 at level 5, 2d10 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Thrash

Description: A wave of green energy courses through the battlefield in a 60 foot cone, centered on you. Any creature caught in the wave must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Any creature that fails the saving throw cannot flee or be switched out as long as you remain in battle.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Thousand Waves

Description: You summon forth a volley of green arrows to pierce creatures in range. All creatures in a 30 ft radius, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a hit, or half as much on a save. Flying-type creatures or ones with Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability CAN be hit by this move. Any creature that fails the saving throw falls to the ground and is now "grounded". Grounded creatures are susceptible to to ground-type moves until they raise up, regardless of their type or ability.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Thousand Arrows

Description: You lash out with a quick attack that may steal a creature's held item. Make a melee attack against a creature, doing dark damage on a hit. If the user does not have an item held, the target must make a DEX save against your Move DC or have their item stolen by the user.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Thief

Description: You disappear from view and reappear at an unoccupied point within range. In wild creature battles, this move can be activated to automatically count as a single success in a group DEX check to run away.
name: Teleport

Description: You use your psychic power to attempt to hold a creature above the ground, making it vulnerable to attacks. Force a creature in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the creature is grappled and restrained for the duration, unable to release itself as long as you hold your concentration. While grappled, the creature is considered "Raised".
name: Telekinesis

Description: You start to perform a difficult dance, confusing all creatures in range. Creatures in a 40 foot circle around you must make a WIS save against your Move DC, becoming confused on a fail.
name: Teeter Dance

Description: You fire a powerful beam of pure light. The line is 80 feet long and 5 feet wide, and all creatues caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The damage type is dependant on the Drive the user holds. (Burn Drive - Fire, Chill Drive - Ice, Douse Drive - Water, Shock Drive - Electric)
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
name: Techno Blast

Description: You fill your eyes with tears to make all creatures in range lose their combative spirit.  All creatures in range must make a CHA save against your Move DC.  On a fail, they add -1 to any attack they makes for the duration.  This modifier can be stacked if an affected creature fails multiple Tearful Look saves, up to a maximum of -5.
name: Tearful Look

Description: You taunt a creature to only attack you with damaging attacks. Choose a target in range and force it to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target can only use damaging attacks that target you for the duration.
name: Taunt

Description: You sacrifice your own position to take down a creature. Roll a melee attack roll. On a hit, you deal normal damage, taking a quarter of the total damage (rounded down) in typeless recoil.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Take Down

Description: You whip up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the speed of all allies in a 60 foot circle, centered on you. You and any ally that starts their turn inside the area has their speed doubled until the end of their turn.
name: Tailwind

Description: You shake your tail at a target, distracting it and opening up its defenses. The creature must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack they target it with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple tail whip saves, up to a maximum of +5.
name: Tail Whip

Description: You strike out against a creature with a quick-hitting, hard tail. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Tail Slap

Description: Your tail emits a flash of light, boosting your attack. For the duration, double your STAB damage.
name: Tail Glow

Description: You rush forward and slam into a creature. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Tackle

Description: You regenerate from the inside, healing some of your wounds. Heal yourself for hit points. If activated in harsh sunlight, double the healing dice.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Synthesis

Description: You emit a strange soundwave that only damages creature that share a type with you. Any creature within a 40 foot circle that shares at least one of your types must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Synchronoise

Description: When you activate this move, a sword appears and dances around you, increasing your AC by 1. As a bonus action on a future turn, you may drop concentration to release this sword and roll a ranged attack at a target within 30 feet of you, dealing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5. At level 10, you can now create two swords for +2 to AC and two ranged attacks. At level 17, the damage dice for each sword increases to 3d8.
name: Swords Dance

Description: Your hands move with incredible speed as you attempt to switch held items with a creature. Force a creature to make a DEX save against your Move DC. On a failure, you take their held item and replace it with your own. If you do not have a held item, you simply take theirs without replacement.
name: Switcheroo

Description: You fire two projectiles at any creature you choose in range. They do not have to target the same creature. Each hit for normal damage. This move also targets creature during the invulnerable stages of Dig, Fly, Bounce, etc.
Scaling: Higher Levels: You fire 4 projectiles at level 5, 5 projectiles at level 10, and 6 projectiles at level 17.
name: Swift

Description: You release a sweet smell directed at a target in range. The target must make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a fail, you have advantage on your next two attacks against that target.
name: Sweet Scent

Description: You lay a kiss on a creature, attempting to confuse them. The target must make an CHA saving throw against your Move DC or become confused.
name: Sweet Kiss

Description: You absorb your Stockpiled energy to heal your wounds. When activated after using Stockpile, regain a base hit points. The dice roll is doubled if two rounds of energy were Stockpiled. The dice roll is tripled if three rounds of energy were Stockpiled.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The base healing dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Swallow

Description: Force a target in range to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target is confused, but it adds +2 to its attack rolls while confused.
name: Swagger

Description: You summon a fast-moving wave in front of you that crashes down on creatures in a 30 foot cone. Any creature caught in the blast must make a STR saving throw, taking water damage and falling prone on a failure, or half as much without falling prone on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Surf

Description: You emit a high pitched screech heard only by the target. Choose a target in range. The target must pass a WIS saving throw against your Move DC or become confused.
name: Supersonic

Description: You strike a target with incredible power - but with great power comes great responsibility. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit. This move exhausts you, and your STR and DEX ability scores are both reduced by 10 until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 6d8 at level 10, and 6d12 at level 17.
name: Superpower

Description: You lash out with an incredible fang attack. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit. On critical hits, instead of doubling the dice, you can choose to do damage equal to half the target's current HP (up to a maximum of 5x your level)..
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Super Fang

Description: You slam into the target with the force of a meteor. Make a melee attack, dealing steel damage on a hit. This move ignores any abilities of the target creature that would decrease its ability to hit or deal full damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Sunsteel Strike

Description: You change the weather to harsh sunlight for 5 rounds.
name: Sunny Day

Description: You lay in a quick punch before a creature has a chance to attack. When targeted by a melee attack, you may use your reaction to attempt to strike a creature before its attack is rolled. Make a melee attack, dealing dark damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Sucker Punch

Description: You surrender a quarter of your current HP (rounded down) into temporary hit points in the form of a shield. During this time, the shield grants you immunity to NEW negative conditions (including things like prone, restrained, etc.) and it absorbs all outside damage that you would normally take until it is destroyed. The shield is considered "typeless" for damage resistance, vulnerability, and immunities. The shield and user cannot be healed while active, and it does not absorb self-inflicted conditions or damage caused by pre-existing burn, poison, or confusion. The shield breaks when it is reduced to 0 hit points, and the user takes the overflow damage. Sound-based moves bypass the shield (Supersonic, Grass Whistle, etc.)
name: Substitute

Description: You attempt a forceful grapple on a target. Make a melee attack, doing fighting damage on a hit, but taking a quarter of the damage dealt in recoil. On a hit, the target is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a creature is grappled, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing fighting damage with a quarter of the damage dealt in typeless recoil.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Submission

Description: When you are subject to a melee attack, you can use your reaction to release a spore that attempts to stun your attacker. The creature must make a CON save against your Move DC, becoming paralyzed on a fail.
name: Stun Spore

Description: This move is known by all Pokémon, and can be used at any time. You lash out with an unarmed strike, or use an improvised weapon up close or at range to damage a creature. Make a melee or ranged attack roll, doing damage equal to 2 + MOVE typeless damage on a hit. The damage from this move cannot be increased by another move, item, or ability.
name: Struggle

Description: You resist an attack, fighting back against a creature. When hit by a melee attack, you may use a reaction to immediately retaliate with an attack roll of your own, dealing bug damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Struggle Bug

Description: You unleash sticky string at a creature in range, slowing it down. Make a ranged attack roll against a target. On a hit, the target's speed is reduced by 10 for the duration. The move is stackable to any amount. The target may take an action to attempt to get rid of any string with a STR save against your Move DC. If this reduction in speed causes their speed to be 0, they are restrained.
name: String Shot

Description: You strike out at a creature with brute strength. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. On a hit, you may also choose to push the creature 5 feet away.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Strength

Description: If a creature attempts to use a move that boosts its stats, you may use your reaction to negate the increase and convert it into healing energy, recovering regain hit points. This includes critical hit bonuses, AC increases, speed, attack and damage boosts, etc.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Strength Sap

Description: You strike a target with a fierce blow. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit. If a target is immune to the damage from critical hits, halve the damage dealt by this attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Storm Throw

Description: You use your psychic energy to attack with stored power. Make a ranged attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit. Add an additional damage dice for each stat-changing effect currently applied to the user. (For example, if you or an ally has activated a move(s) that is currently boosting the user's AC, speed, and STAB, add three additional damage dice. A move that affects multiple ability scores is considered "one" effect for this boost)
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Stored Power

Description: The earth moves beneath a target's feet as sharp stone pierce through the ground underneath them. Creatures in a 10 foot radius centered on a point you choose in range must make a DEX save against your MOVE DC, taking rock damage on a fail, or half as much on a save.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Stone Edge

Description: Driven by frustration, you aggressively attack. Make a melee attack, dealing ground damage on a hit. If you last attack missed, double the dice roll for damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Stomping Tantrum

Description: You raise your feet up for a stomp attack. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing normal damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Stomp

Description: You use your action to store energy for a Spit Up or Swallow move, increasing your defense. Raise your AC by 1 until you use one of those two moves. This move may be stacked a maximum of 3 times before the energy is used.
name: Stockpile

Description: You quickly fire a sticky web at a creature entering the battle. When a creature is switched into battle, you may use your reaction to make a ranged attack on the creature. On a hit, the target is restrained. The creature may make a STR save against your Move DC at the beginning of each of its turns to escape the web.
name: Sticky Web

Description: You strike a target hard with outstretched wings. Make a melee attack on a creature, doing steel damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, your AC is increased by 1 until the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Steel Wing

Description: You roll up your body and roll over a creature. Make a melee attack roll, dealing bug damage on a hit. If your natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Steamroller

Description: You shoot out a cone of intensely hot steam from your body, immersing creatures in range. Any creature in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking water damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a target fails the save by 5 or more, it becomes burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Steam Eruption

Description: You quickly summon a trap of sharp rocks that hurts a creature entering the battle. When a creature is switched into battle, you may use your reaction to make a ranged attack, dealing rock damage to the incoming creature on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Stealth Rock

Description: You shine a bright light on a creature in range that follows them around the battlefield. The target must make a DEX save against your Move DC. On a fail, attacks against that creature have advantage for the duration.
name: Spotlight

Description: When you are targeted by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to release a spore that attempts to put your attacker to sleep. The creature must make a CON save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a fail.
name: Spore

Description: You flail around on the ground, doing no damage and looking ridiculous, but you can leap up to 50 feet in the air.
name: Splash

Description: When hit with an attack, you can spend a reaction to attempt to drain the attacker's PP, if they are in range. Force the attacker to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, roll a d4. The PP of the move that attacked you is decreased by that number.
Scaling: Higher Levels: PP is drained by 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
name: Spite

Description: The power of energy stored by Stockpile is released against a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature, dealing a base normal damage on a hit. The dice roll is doubled if two rounds of energy were Stockpiled. The dice roll is tripled if three rounds of energy were Stockpiled.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Spit Up

Description: You employ dark energy to stitch a creature's shadow to the ground. Make a ranged attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. On hit, the target is unable to flee or switch out while the user remains in battle.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Spirit Shackle

Description: You quickly raise a spiked shield to protect yourself from damage. When you are hit by a melee attack, use your reaction to ignore damage, dealing grass damage equal to your proficiency modifier to the attacker instead. On future instances of this reaction in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.
name: Spiky Shield

Description: You set a trap of spikes that hurts creature that come into battle. If a trainer is in range and switches out a creature, you can spend a reaction to make a ranged attack on the incoming creature with spikes that come out of the ground, doing ground damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Spikes

Description: You fire a series of sharp spikes at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Spike Cannon

Description: You fire a sticky web that attempts to restrain a creature. Make a ranged attack roll on a target in range. On a hit, the target is covered in web. While covered, it is restrained and cannot flee or be switched out, except by item, Move, or ability. The target can use an action on its turn to escape with a STR save against your Move DC.
name: Spider Web

Description: You use your psychic power to swap speed with a creature.  Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, switch speed with the target for the duration.
name: Speed Swap

Description: You succumb to darkness and transport yourself into a creature's shadow. Immediately teleport to a point in range and make a melee attack on a creature. On hit, you steal all positive stat changes affecting the creature and deal ghost damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 6d8 at level 10, and 6d12 at level 17.
name: Spectral Thief

Description: You burst into song, unleashing a flurry of bubbles in a 20 foot circle, centered on you. All creatures in range must make a DEX save or take water damage on a fail and half as much on a save. Any creature suffering from the burned condition will be cured upon touching the bubbles.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Sparkling Aria

Description: You strike out with an electrified tackle with a chance to paralyze a target. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing electric damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Spark

Description: You release a powerful shockwave that tears through creatures and the space around them. All creatures within 30 feet of you must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail this save by 5 or more become uncontrollable and are sucked into the Ethereal Plane until the beginning of your next turn, appearing in the same location when they return.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Spacial Rend

Description: You unleash a deafening sound that harms creature in a 40 foot circle, centered on you. Creatures in range must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 20 flat normal damage on a fail, or half as much on a success.
name: Sonic Boom

Description: When you activate this move, you use your action gathering in solar energy to prepare to strike with blades. On your next turn, if you keep your concentration, use an action to make a melee attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. If this move is used in harsh sunlight, double your MOVE modifier for damage and it can be used on the turn it is activated, without concentration.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Solar Blade

Description: When you use this move, soak in solar energy and prepare to unleash a devastating beam. On your next turn, if you keep your concentration, use an action to create a 80 foot line of solar energy, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save or take grass damage on a fail and half as much on a save. If this move is used in harsh sunlight, double your MOVE modifier for damage and it can be used on the turn it is activated, without concentration.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Solar Beam

Description: Heal a creature in range for hitpoints.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice roll for healing changes to 4d6 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Soft-Boiled

Description: You fire a torrent of water at a creature that leaves lasting effects. Force a target in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, its type changes to water through its next three full turns in battle.
name: Soak

Description: While you are asleep, you may activate this move to create a harsh noise that damages all creature within range for normal damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Snore

Description: You call upon dark energy to steal an effect from a creature. When a creature in range activates a move with a positive effect on itself (curing negative status effect, boosting stats, healing, etc.), force it to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, you gain the positive effect and the target's move fails.
name: Snatch

Description: You release a harsh growl at a creature, damaging their willpower. Force a creature to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target takes dark damage. If you are the target of its next attack, the attack is rolled at disadvantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Snarl

Description: You conjure a line of smoke on the battlefield, 60 feet long and 5 feet thick, that extends in any direction from a point within range. The area on either side is obscured and imposes disadvantage on any ranged attacks made by a creature targeting another on the opposite side. Any creature inside the wall of smoke, when it is conjured, must make a CON save against your Move DC or become blinded for the duration. A blinded creature can repeat the save at the beginning of its turns to remove the effect on a success.
name: Smokescreen

Description: You release a toxic cloud of poisonous smog in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Any creature that starts their turn in this area must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC, taking poison damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail this save by 5 or more become poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Smog

Description: You procure a handful of strong smelling salt, damaging a creature's senses. Make a ranged attack against a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. If the target is paralyzed, double the dice roll for the damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Smelling Salts

Description: You pinpoint the perfect place to strike a creature with a horn as strong as steel. This move is guaranteed to hit for steel damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Smart Strike

Description: You throw a solid piece of stone at a creature in an attempt to bring them to the ground. Make a ranged attack, dealing rock damage on a hit. On a hit, any "Raised" creature is knocked prone and loses its flying speed and immunity to ground-type moves until it can move again. This move can target creatures in the invulnerable stage of Fly or Bounce.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Smack Down

Description: You spew poisonous sludge at a target creature in range. Make a ranged attack, doing poison damage on a hit. The creature must make a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Sludge

Description: You summon a wave of poisonous sludge that crashes down on creatures in a 30 foot cone. Any creature caught in the blast must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC, taking poison damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it becomes poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Sludge Wave

Description: You hurl a mass of sticky sludge that may poison creatures in its blast. Make a ranged attack roll against a target. On a hit, the target takes poison damage and the area in a 5 foot radius around it is covered in sludge until the beginning of your next turn. Any creature that enters this area for the first time on their turn, or is in that area at the beginning of their turn must make a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Sludge Bomb

Description: This move can only be used if you are asleep. While asleep, activate a random move from your move list (not Sleep Talk) that has a move time of "1 action".
name: Sleep Talk

Description: You release a cluster of spores at a creature in range, attempting to put them to sleep. The target must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC or fall asleep.
name: Sleep Powder

Description: You slash out at a creature in range. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit. Slash results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Slash

Description: You crush a creature with a slam attack. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Slam

Description: You give yourself a break, healing your wounds. When you activate this move, you become incapacitated immediately and through your next two turns. Your trainer may not switch you out during this time. At the end of the second turn, regain half of your maximum hit points and become stable once again.
name: Slack Off

Description: You unleash a devastating uppercutting fist that continues to strike skyward with force. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit. This move can target creatures in the invulnerable stages of Fly, Bounce and Sky Drop, if the target used that move within range.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Sky Uppercut

Description: You reach out in an attempt to lift a creature up in the air for a slamming attack. When you activate this move, make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target is grappled. The target may use its next action to attempt a STR save against your Move DC to get free. If it does not succeed, and you maintain your concentration, you may use your action on your next turn to lift the creature into the air, dropping it to the ground for flying damage. Flying-type creatures or ones under the effect of "Levitate", "Magnet Rise" or other similar abilities/moves are not damaged.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Sky Drop

Description: When you use this move, you flap your wings menacingly and prepare to strike a creature within range. On your next turn's action, if you keep your concentration, you dive at a creature in range, ignoring your flying speed and any opportunity attacks you may incur. Make a melee attack roll, doing flying damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Sky Attack

Description: When you use this move, you lower your head and prepare to strike a target within range. On your next turn's action, if you keep your concentration, you charge at a creature in range, ignoring your walking speed and any opportunity attacks you may incur. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. A creature hit with this attack must succeed on a STR saving throw against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Skull Bash

Description: You attempt to swap abilities with a creature for the duration. Select a target in range and force them to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, choose which abilities to switch for the duration.
name: Skill Swap

Description: When any move is activated within sight of you, use a reaction to copy it to your move list, replacing it with one instance of Sketch in your current move list permanently. Sketch may not be used to copy a Signature or Legendary-only Move.
name: Sketch

Description: You sing a beautiful song in an attempt to put creatures to to sleep. Roll ; the total is how many hit points of creature this move can affect. creatures within 30 feet of you are affected in ascending order of their current hit points. Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this move falls asleep. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The number of hit points affected changes to 7d8 at level 5, 6d12 at level 10, and 11d8 at level 17.
name: Sing

Description: You use a mysterious psychic energy to change a target's ability to Simple. Force a target in range to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, choose one of the target's abilities and change it to Simple for the duration.
name: Simple Beam

Description: You strike a target with a battering wind of silver dust. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature, doing bug damage on a hit. On a natural roll of 19 or 20, all of your ability scores go up by 1 while you remain in battle. This move can be stacked for a maximum of +5 to all ability scores.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Silver Wind

Description: A flashing beam strikes a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature, dealing bug damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the beam confuses the target.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Signal Beam

Description: You use the power of the earth around you to help heal your wounds, recovering hit points. If used during a Sandstorm, your MOVE modifier is doubled.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Shore Up

Description: A burst of electric energy glides forward, striking anything in a 15 foot cone. This move is guaranteed to hit all creatures caught in the wave for electric damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Shock Wave

Description: You rotate your gears quickly, raising your attack and speed. When you activate this move, add +1 to your attack and damage rolls, and +10 to your speed for the duration.
name: Shift Gear

Description: You set a shell trap that explodes in a 5ft radius. As a bonus action on the initial activation of this move, you set a trap on yourself. Only one trap may be set at a time. When you are hit by an attack, you can use a reaction to detonate the trap. Creatures within 5 feet of you must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, rolling at disadvantage, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Shell Trap

Description: You break off a piece of your shell, lowering your defense but improving your attack. For the duration, lower your AC by 1, but add proficiency to all damage rolls (once per move). This move is not stackable.
name: Shell Smash

Description: You send a chill down the spine of a creature, freezing its core. Choose a target in range and roll a d20. On a 20, the target faints. On any other roll, this move has no effect. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.
name: Sheer Cold

Description: You collect your focus, sharpening your combat skills. You may add to all attack rolls for the duration.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 10.
name: Sharpen

Description: You extend your shadow to strike a creature from behind. As a bonus action, you can control your shadow to make a melee attack roll against a target within range, dealing ghost damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Shadow Sneak

Description: You throw a punch from the surrounding shadows, unavoidable by any creature. This move is guaranteed to hit for ghost damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Shadow Punch

Description: You disappear from view and prepare to surprise a target with an attack. When you activate this move, you become invisible and immune to any attacks of opportunity. You cannot be targeted by attacks while you are invisible. On your next turn, you use may your action to reappear at a point within range and make a melee attack against a creature, with advantage, dealing ghost damage on a successful hit. Protect and Detect reactions may not be used when hit by this attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 6d8 at level 10, and 6d12 at level 17.
name: Shadow Force

Description: You strike with a sharp claw made from shadows in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. This moves scores a critical hit on natural attack rolls of 19 and 20.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Shadow Claw

Description: You strike out with a bone-infused with a wayward spirt. Make a melee attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or higher, the target's AC is decreased by 1 while it remains in battle. This decrease may be stacked up to a maximum of -5 to AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Shadow Bone

Description: You hurl a sphere of magical darkness at a creature. Make a ranged attack, doing ghost damage on a hit. On a hit, the ball expands and covers the creatures face, granting them a -2 to hit on any attack they make before the end of their next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Shadow Ball

Description: You release a massive explosion in a 30 foot radius, fainting immediately before the damage is dealt. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC. If your creature has at least half its hit points left, anyone in range takes normal damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. If your creature has less than half of its hit points left, the damage is halved for a failed save, and quartered for a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Self-Destruct

Description: You attempt to throw a creature into the ground with tremendous force. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, deal an amount of fighting damage equal to + the user's level. Seismic Toss results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4+Level at level 5, 1d12+Level at level 10, and 4d4+Level at level 17.
name: Seismic Toss

Description: You release a bright shockwave from your body, damaging all creatures within 20 feet of you. Any creature in range must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking grass damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Until the end of your next turn, any attack roll made against a target that failed is rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Seed Flare

Description: You fire a series of hard seeds that crash down on top of a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Seed Bomb

Description: You attempt to pierce a creature with one of your sharp appendages. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. This move ignores any boosts affecting the target's AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
name: Secret Sword

Description: You strike a target with unknown power. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, dealing normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or higher, roll a d6 and cause the random effect. | d6 | Effect | |:---:|:-----------:| | 1 | Poison | | 2 | Burn | | 3 | Confusion | | 4 | Frozen | | 5 | Paralysis | | 6 | Sleep |
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Secret Power

Description: Searing hot flames lick out at creatures in a 20 foot circle, centered on you. Any creature in range must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a target fails the save by 5 or more, it is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Searing Shot

Description: You let out a horrible screech at creatures in a 20 foot radius, centered on you, distracting them and opening up their defenses. The creatures must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack they target an affected creature with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if a creature fails multiple screech saves, up to a maximum of +3.
name: Screech

Description: You slash out at a creature in range. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Scratch

Description: You put on your scariest face, attempting to paralyze a creature with fear. Force a target in range to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target is paralyzed.
name: Scary Face

Description: You instantly boil water within you to a damaging temperature, blasting a creature with its heat. Make a ranged attack, dealing water damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or more, the target is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Scald

Description: You stir up a massive sandstorm in a 50 foot radius, centered on a point in range. When a non rock-, steel-, or ground-type creature enters the area for the first time on their turn, or begins their turn inside the area, they take an amount of rock damage equal to half your level, rounded up. The Sandstorm lasts for 5 rounds.
name: Sandstorm

Description: You attempt to summon a wave of sand that surrounds the target. Force a creature in range to make a STR saving throw against your Move DC, taking ground damage and becoming restrained on a failure, or half as much without being restrained on a success. If it fails, at the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a creature is restrained, you may continue this move, as an action, to deal an automatic ground damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Sand Tomb

Description: You kick up a cloud of sand in an attempt to blind a target in range. The target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, for the remainder of the encounter, they add -1 to all of their attack rolls. This move can be stacked for a maximum of -5 to attack rolls.
name: Sand Attack

Description: You and all allies in range boost their defense. For the duration, anyone affected is protected from any new negative status conditions.
name: Safeguard

Description: You attempt to pierce a creature with one of your sharp appendages. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. This move ignores any boosts affecting the target's AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Sacred Sword

Description: You unleash a devastating, concentrated blast of flame at a single target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing fire damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 10 or more, the target is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Sacred Fire

Description: You attack a creature's mind with a harsh song. Select a target in range and force them to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target takes normal damage. If an ally in range also knows this move, they can join in the song as a reaction to add an additional damage dice.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d10 at level 17.
name: Round

Description: You imbue the ground around you with a mystical layer of natural energy, like tilling fresh soil. For three rounds, grass-type creatures double their STAB bonus when activating a grass-type move within the affected area.
name: Rototiller

Description: You land on the ground to rest your body. When activated, your flying speed decreases to zero, and you lose your flying type for as long as you remain on the ground. At the beginning of your next turn, if you have not left the ground, recover hit points
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Roost

Description: You roll into a target, repeatedly making attacks with increasing strength. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing rock damage on a hit. If you use this move on your turn in consecutive rounds, double the dice on each successful attack for a maximum of 5 attacks, in which case the damage would reset. Ex: on first hit, on second, , , . The damage resets if any of the attacks fail to damage a creature, if your speed is reduced to 0, or if you are incapacitated.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice changes to a d8 at level 5, a d10 at level 10, and a d12 at level 17.
name: Rollout

Description: You swing your feet around in a wide arc to strike a target. Make a melee attack roll, doing fighting damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Rolling Kick

Description: You attempt to copy a creature's abilities for the duration. Select a target in range and force them to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, replace one of your own current abilities with one of theirs.
name: Role Play

Description: You summon a huge boulder and launch it at a target in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing rock damage on a hit. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
name: Rock Wrecker

Description: You summon a collection of boulders that attempt to surround a target. Force a creature in range to make a STR saving throw against your Move DC, taking rock damage and becoming restrained on a failure, or half as much without being restrained on a success. If it fails, at the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a creature is restrained, you may continue this move, as an action, to deal an automatic rock damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Rock Tomb

Description: You hurl a rock at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing rock damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Rock Throw

Description: You strike out with a rock-crushing attack that may lower a user's defense. Make an attack roll against a creature, doing fighting damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target's AC decreases by 1 while it remains in battle.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Rock Smash

Description: Large boulders appear above a target creature in range, crashing down on top of them. The target must make a STR save against your Move DC, taking rock damage and falling prone on a failed save, and half as much without falling prone on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Rock Slide

Description: You polish your body to a fine shine to reduce friction. When activating this move, increase your AC by 2 and your speed by 20 feet for three rounds.
name: Rock Polish

Description: You charge at a target with an attack that attempts to confuse. Make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 17 or higher, the target becomes confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Rock Climb

Description: You summon a series of rocks that fire their way towards a creature. Make a ranged attack roll, doing rock damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional rock damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Rock Blast

Description: You release an intimidating roar at all opponents within 15 feet of you. Opponents that can hear you must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the creature is frightened and is forced to immediately move up to its speed in a straight line away from its attacker, or until met with an impeding force (this forced movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity). A creature frightened in this way must make a WIS save at the end of each of its turns against your Move DC to remove the effect.
name: Roar

Description: You unleash a roar that has the power to distort time. All creatures within 40 feet of you must make a WIS save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. For any creature that failed the save by 5 or more, you may immediately take another action against them. Roar of Time may not be used as one of the additional actions. This move drains you of energy, and you may not make any attack until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Roar of Time

Description: You unleash an all out attack that is stronger the less HP you have. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing fighting damage on a hit. If you are below 50% of your maximum health, double the damage. If you are at 10% or below of your maximum health, triple the damage. The multiplier for this attack occurs before the multiplier for resistances or vulnerabilities.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Reversal

Description: You invoke a fight within to retaliate against a creature that damages you. As a reaction, when you are hit with a melee attack that deals damage, make a melee attack roll against your attacker, with disadvantage. On a hit, deal the same amount of fighting type damage back at your attacker (maximum of 5x your current level).
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Revenge

Description: You strike out at a target with an aggressive dance. Make a melee attack, dealing damage on a hit. Revelation Dance deals damage with a different type depending on the style of Oricorio: | Style | Damage Type | |:---:|:-----------:| | Baile Style | Fire | | Pom-Pom Style | Electric | | Pa'u Style | Psychic | | Sensu Style | Ghost |
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Revelation Dance

Description: You lash out at a creature, in hopes it will please your trainer. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing on a hit. When you make this attack, add an additional bonus to hit and damage equal to the number of levels you are above zero on the Loyalty Chart.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Return

Description: You rush to avenge a fallen ally. When a creature causes an ally to faint, you may move up to your speed to immediately rush forward and make a melee attack roll on the target, dealing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Retaliate

Description: When you activate this move, you fall asleep after the end of your turn, but recover hit points in the process. You do not regain health if you do not fall asleep.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice roll for healing increases to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 8d10 at level 17.
name: Rest

Description: You sing an ancient song that damages creatures in range with the chance to put them asleep. Any creature in a 40 foot circle, centered on you, must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a failure, or half as much ona success. Any creature that fails the save by 5 or more is put to sleep.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Relic Song

Description: A wave of healing energy washes over you, curing poison, paralysis, and burn.
name: Refresh
