Description: When you are subject to a melee attack, use your reaction to take half the damage dealt now and on any melee attack that targets you until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Reflect

Description: Your body flashes into a mirror for just a moment. When it returns to normal, you take on the type of a creature in range.
name: Reflect Type

Description: You summon a previously discarded item back into your hands. If you used a consumable held item any time within the last 5 turns, you can activate this move to take advantage of the same effect one last time. This move may not be used in the same round the held item was used.
name: Recycle

Description: You extend a healing energy to recover the hit points of a creature in range. The target regains hit points.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice roll for healing increases to 2d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Recover

Description: When you use this move, strong winds begin to circle around you, granting +2 to AC. On your next turn, if you keep your concentration, you release those winds as an action in a 20 foot radius, centered on you. Each creature in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a fail, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Razor Wind

Description: You strike a creature with a razor sharp shell. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing water damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 18 or higher, lower the creatures AC by 1. This decrease may be stacked, up to a maximum of -5 to AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Razor Shell

Description: You send a razor sharp leaf at a creature in range at tremendous speed. Make a ranged attack roll, doing grass damage on a hit. Razor Leaf results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Razor Leaf

Description: You strike out with an incredibly fast spinning move. All creatures within melee range must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. In addition, this move automatically frees the user from Leech Seed or anything causing it to be grappled or restrained. It is removed from these statuses before the saving throw is made.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Rapid Spin

Description: You summon a heavy rainfall that covers the battlefield for 5 rounds.
name: Rain Dance

Description: You go into a fit of rage, attacking with relentless fury. While you are raging, you gain +1 on all damage rolls (only once per move), have resistance to normal damage, and have advantage on all Strength checks. Your rage ends if you drop concentration or if your turn ends and you have not attacked a hostile target since your last turn, or taken any damage since then.
Scaling: Higher Levels: For damage when raging, the bonus changes to +2 at level 5, +4 at level 10, and +6 at level 17.
name: Rage

Description: You scatter a cloud of irritating powder, drawing attacks to yourself. Any creature in a 15 foot cone must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the creature(s) can only use damaging moves that target you for the duration. Any creature affected can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns to shake off the effect.
name: Rage Powder

Description: You lightly perform a mystical dance. For the duration, add +1 to your AC, attack rolls, and damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: Add +2 to your AC at level 10 and above
name: Quiver Dance

Description: You have the ability to rush to the aid of an ally at the start of combat. If an ally in range (or you) is attacked on the very first turn of the very first round of combat, you may use your reaction to negate any damage dealt.
name: Quick Guard

Description: You lash out with a quick unarmed strike at a creature in range. As a bonus action, you can immediately move up to 10ft and make a melee attack against a creature in range without taking an attack of opportunity, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
name: Quick Attack

Description: You send dark energy at a creature in range, reducing their will to fight. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, it must move to the bottom of the initiative order for this round only. Targets that have already taken their turn in this round are unaffected.
name: Quash

Description: As a reaction, when a creature is fleeing or is switched out by their trainer, you may make a ranged attack roll against it, doing dark damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Pursuit

Description: You extend a healing energy to remove all status effects from a target. If a status effect is healed, it also restores the user's current hit points by twice its level. The user of this move cannot target itself.
name: Purify

Description: You send dark energy to punish a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature, dealing dark damage on a hit. If the target is currently under the influence of a move or ability that boosts its attack, damage, or AC, increase the damage by one damage dice for each effect.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d10 at level 17.
name: Punishment

Description: You emit a wave of psychic energy in a 40 foot line, 5 feet wide. Each creature caught in the wave must make a WIS save against your Move DC, becoming confused on a fail.
name: Psywave

Description: You materialize a psychic wave that shocks a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Psystrike

Description: You materialize a psychic wave that shocks a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Psyshock

Description: You employ your psychic power to transfer a status condition to someone else. Choose a willing ally (or yourself) and a creature in range. Force the target to make a WIS save against your Move DC. on a failure, a status affecting the ally (or you) is transferred to the target instead.
name: Psycho Shift

Description: You tear at a target with blades formed by psychic power. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing psychic damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on natural rolls of 19 or 20.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Psycho Cut

Description: You send an extremely powerful wave of psychic energy at creatures in a 60 foot cone. Creatures in the wave must make a WIS save against your Move DC, taking psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The power of the move exhausts you, and your next attack is done at disadvantage. If your next attack requires a creature saving throw, they have advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Psycho Boost

Description: You tap into a target's mind, damaging their will to fight. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range, doing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target becomes confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Psychic

Description: Psychic energy emerges from the ground in an 80 foot circle, centered on you. Begininng at the end of your turn, for three rounds, all grounded creatures in the affected area are unable to use bonus actions. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability. In addition, creatures may double their MOVE modifier on damage rolls from psychic-type moves activated inside the area.
name: Psychic Terrain

Description: You materialize a set of large fangs that bite at a creature with psychic energy. Make a ranged attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit. On a hit, this move bypasses and ends Aurora veil, and is not affected by Light Screen and Reflect.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Psychic Fangs

Description: You sync up with a creature, copying any positive or negative stat changes affecting them due to weather or moves this combat.
name: Psych Up

Description: You send a beam of invisible, psychic energy at a target in range. The target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC, taking psychic damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by 5 or more become confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Psybeam

Description: You sense incoming danger and are able to quickly avoid it. When you are the recipient of the damage and/or effects of a move, you may automatically avoid the damage/effects on the first instance of this reaction. On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful. This reaction may not be used to guard against the damage/effects that result from a natural 20 attack roll.
name: Protect

Description: You use the power of a prism to fire a collection of dangerous lasers in a 60 foot line, 5ft wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed a DEX save or take psychic damage on a fail, and half as much on a save. This move cannot be used on consecutive turns by the same creature.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 6d8 at level 10, and 6d12 at level 17.
name: Prismatic Laser

Description: You send a booby-trapped gift to a creature. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range. On a hit, the present explodes, doing normal damage. If the natural attack roll is 2 or lower, however, regardless if it hits, the present provides the target with hit points instead.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Present

Description: You gather in the natural energy of the land around you and manifest all of the power into fearsome blades of stone. Make three ranged attack rolls against any creature(s) in range, dealing ground damage on each successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Precipice Blades

Description: You strike out with a powerful punch that increases in strength the more you hit. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing fighting damage on a successful hit against the same creature. For each successful hit, add an additional damage dice, with a maximum number of damage dice equal to double the original amount. The damage resets if you miss or target a different creature.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Power-Up Punch

Description: You violently whirl your tentacles or vines towards a target. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing grass damage on a hit
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Power Whip

Description: You boast your strength and attack a target. Make a melee attack, doing dark damage on a hit. For each unique stat change affecting the user, add an additional damage dice.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
name: Power Trip

Description: You employ your psychic power to switch your own attack and defense. Until the end of your next turn, switch your AC with an ability score of your choice (Constitution not included)
name: Power Trick

Description: As a bonus action, force a creature in range to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, you employ your psychic power to swap a single ability score with a creature until the end of their next turn, for purposes of attack and damage rolls.
name: Power Swap

Description: You use your psychic power to change your offense to match the target's the best you can. Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, choose either your STR, DEX, or WIS. For the duration, replace the chosen ability score with the average of your current score and the target's score.
name: Power Split

Description: A ray of light bursts out of your gemstone, damaging a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing rock damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Power Gem

Description: You quickly coat a creature in an explosive powder. When a creature in range activates a fire-type move, you may use your reaction to release a spray of flammable powder that explodes and automatically deals typeless damage to the target.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Powder

Description: You send a blast of cold snow at a creature. Make a ranged attack roll on a creature, doing ice damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target is frozen.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Powder Snow

Description: You crush a creature with a pound attack. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Pound

Description: You send forth a flurry of pollen at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing bug damage on a hit. If the target is an ally, this move automatically hits and heals for the amount of damage instead.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Pollen Puff

Description: Poisonous barbs sprout from your tail as you swing it at a creature. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing poison damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is a 19 or 20, the move scores a critical hit and the target is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Poison Tail

Description: You strike out at a creature with a poisonous sting. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing poison damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the creature is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Poison Sting

Description: You release a cluster of poisonous spores that burst into the air above a target. The creature must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC, becoming poisoned on a fail.
name: Poison Powder

Description: You stab a creature with an appendage steeped in poison. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Poison Jab

Description: You create a fog of poisonous gas in a 15 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Creatures that begin their turn in the area take poison damage and must succeed on a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned. The gas cloud dissipates at the beginning of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Poison Gas

Description: You lash forward with poisonous venom. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, dealing poison damage on a hit, forcing the target to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the creature is poisoned. A creature poisoned by this move takes double the normal poison damage at the end of each of its turns.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Poison Fang

Description: You peck at a target, attempting to grab their held berry. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing flying damage on a hit. On a hit, if the target is holding a berry, you swallow it immediately and gain its effect.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Pluck

Description: You fake a creature out with a playful attack that quickly becomes too rough. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing fairy damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 19 or 20, the target adds -1 to any attack it makes for the remainder of combat. This effect can be stacked to a maximum of -5 to hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Play Rough

Description: You convince a creature that you mean it no harm. Force a creature to make a CHA saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, any attack the target makes on its next turn is rolled at disadvantage. If the target activates a move that requires a saving throw, you have advantage on the roll.
name: Play Nice

Description: You charge up your firsts with electricity and lash out at a target. Make a melee attack, dealing electric damage on a hit. On a hit, both you and your target's normal-type moves become electric-type until the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Plasma Fists

Description: You strike a creature with sharp projectiles in quick succession. Make a ranged attack roll, doing bug damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another projectile hits again for an additional bug damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Pin Missile

Description: A pillar of light erupts from the ground in a 20ft radius, 80ft high cylinder centered on a point in range. Any creature caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. This move ignores any of the creatures abilities that would affect the user's ability to hit or deal full damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Photon Geyser

Description: You disappear from view and prepare to surprise your target with an attack. When you activate this move, you become invisible and immune to any attacks of opportunity. You cannot be targeted by attacks while you are invisible. On your next turn, you use your action to reappear and make a melee attack against a creature, with advantage, dealing ghost damage on a successful hit. Protect and Detect reactions may not be used when hit by this attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Phantom Force

Description: You dance around, releasing a flurry of sharp leaf attacks against a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing grass damage on a hit. On the following turn, you may choose to use this action again to hit automatically, but if you do, you become confused at the end of your turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Petal Dance

Description: You stir up a blizzard of sharp petals that swirl around you. Any creature in a 60 foot circle, centered on you, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking grass damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Petal Blizzard

Description: You perform a song with devastating consequences to creatures that hear it. All creatures in range (including you) must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC. For any that fail, they faint in 3 rounds, on their turn, unless fleeing or switched out by their trainer before the end of the three rounds.
name: Perish Song

Description: You hammer down on a target with a peck attack. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing flying damage on a successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Peck

Description: You strike hard in retaliation. Make a melee attack, dealing dark damage on a hit. If the target damaged you on the turn immediately before yours, double the dice roll for the damage of this attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Payback

Description: You strike a target, causing it to shake out its purse. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit. In addition, 10x the user's level in cash is scattered on the floor until the end of combat. This release of funds can only occur once per target per combat.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Pay Day

Description: You deliver a brutal parting threat just before switching out. Force a creature in range to make a WIS save against your Move DC, then switch out immediately. On a failure, the target deals half damage on their next turn if using a damaging move.
name: Parting Shot

Description: A sweeping electric charge arcs around you, stealing some of the target's energy. Force all creatures in a 60 foot circle, centered on you, to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking electric damage on a failure. Recover hit points equal to half the total damage dealt, but no more than 5 times your level.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Parabolic Charge

Description: You split pain from your injuries with your attacker. Target a creature in range, forcing them to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, both you and your attacker change your current health points to the average of the two. If this causes either creature to go above maximum health, they take their maximum health instead.
name: Pain Split

Description: With a roar, flames burst from your body in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. Any creature in range must roll a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The power of the move exhausts you, and your next attack is done at disadvantage. If your next attack requires a creature saving throw, they have advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Overheat

Description: You go into a rampage, doing several attacks without control for three rounds. This move automatically hits for dragon damage in the first round, dragon damage in the second round, and dragon damage in the third round. When this move ends, either after the third round or from breaking concentration, you become confused. This attack stops if concentration is broken, or the user becomes incapacitated.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice used for this move changes to a d8 at level 5, a d10 at level 10, and a d12 at level 17.
name: Outrage

Description: Your body glows a bright and brilliant blue, sending three beams of focused light at any creature(s) in range. Make a ranged attack for each beam, dealing water damage on each successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Origin Pulse

Description: You stir up a gust of repulsive wind that strikes a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, increase all of your ability scores by +1 while you remain in battle.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Ominous Wind

Description: When you activate this move, choose a target in range. For the duration, the target cannot activate any move that would increase its AC. If it has already activated such a move, the effect ends immediately. In addition, for the duration, no creature in range has immunity to your Ghost, Normal, or Fighting-type moves.
name: Odor Sleuth

Description: You send a blast of ink towards your creatures. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target must add -1 to attack rolls for the remainder of this combat.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Octazooka

Description: You extend your wings and use a dark beam of energy to absorb the target's life force. Make a ranged attack against a creature, dealing flying damage on a hit, recovering your own hit points by the amount of damage dealt.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Oblivion Wing

Description: You touch a creature with your electrified cheeks, sending electricity coursing through their veins. Make an attack roll against a creature. On a hit, the target takes electric damage and is forced to make a CON save against your Move DC, becoming paralyzed on a failure.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Nuzzle

Description: You let out a stunning roar that intimidates a target. When targeted by an attack, use this reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
name: Noble Roar

Description: You create a horrible nightmare in the mind of any sleeping creature in a 120 foot circle around you, inflicting ghost damage automatically. This move does not wake a sleeping creature.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Nightmare

Description: You slash out at a creature with dark power. Make a melee attack, dealing dark damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical hit on natural attack rolls of 19 or 20.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Night Slash

Description: You hit a target with a necrotic wave of dark energy. Make a ranged attack against a target. On a hit, the ghost damage is equal to + the user's level.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4+Level at level 5, 1d12+Level at level 10, and 4d4+Level at level 17.
name: Night Shade

Description: A pitch black shockwave of dark energy rushes towards a target. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing dark damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 13 or more, the target rolls its next attack with disadvantage. If it activates a move that requires a saving throw, the target(s) have advantage on the roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Night Daze

Description: Your arms turn to jagged, thorny needles as you strike a creature. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing grass damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is a 15 or more, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Needle Arm

Description: You harness all the power of nature and send it at a creature in range. The target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failed save, the target loses half their current HP (minimum of 1 damage).
name: Nature's Madness

Description:
You call upon the powers of nature nearby and activate a move based on the terrain. The DM gets final say on what move you activate, but here are example terrain types:

| Terrain  | Move |
|:---:|:-----------:|
|  Cities/Roads/Buildings  | Swift |
|  Sandy areas  | Earthquake |
|  Volcanoes/Lava areas  | Fire Blast |
|  Caves, Dark areas  | Shadow Ball |
|  Rocky terrain, Mountains  | Rock Slide |
|  Fields, Plains  | Stun Spore |
|  Forests, Tall Grasslands  | Razor Leaf |
|  Ponds/Swamps  | Bubble Beam |
|  At sea | Surf |
|  Underwater | Hydro Pump |
|  Snowy | Blizzard |
name: Nature Power

Description:
You draw in power from your held berry, releasing it into a ranged attack. Make a ranged attack, dealing damage on a hit. The type is dependant on what berry you are holding, according to the chart below:
| Type | Berry| |:---:|:-----------:| | Normal | Chilan | | Fire | Cherri, Occa | | Water | Chesto, Passho | | Electric | Pecha, Waccan | | Grass | Rawst, Rindo | | Ice | Aspear, Yache | | Fighting | Leppa, Chople | | Poison | Oran, Kebia | | Ground | Persim, Shucca | | Type | Berry | |:---:|:-----------:| | Flying | Lum, Coba | | Psychic | Sitrus, Payapa | | Bug | Tanga | | Rock | Charti | | Ghost | Kasib | | Dragon | Haban | | Dark | Colbur | | Steel | Babiri, Razz | | Fairy | Roseli |
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Natural Gift

Description: You stimulate your brain with nasty thoughts. For the duration, you have advantage on any attacks with the Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma move power. If the attack requires a Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma saving throw, the target has disadvantage.
name: Nasty Plot

Description: You summon forth a pair of mystical flames that dance around a target, dealing damage. Make a ranged attack roll against a target, dealing fire damage on a hit. If the target is hit with this attack, any attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn is rolled at disadvantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Mystical Fire

Description: You strike out with inner power, depending on your type. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing damage of your current type.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Multi-Attack

Description: You fire a stream of muddy water at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack against a creature, dealing water damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target has disadvantage on its next attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Muddy Water

Description: You hurl mud at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing ground damage on a hit. On a hit, the target adds -1 to its attack rolls for the rest of the encounter. This decrease may be stacked, up to a maximum of -5 to hit. The target may take an action to remove any mud from its face, resetting the effect.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Mud-Slap

Description: You cover yourself and all allies around you with thick mud, reducing the amount of electric damage taken for anyone affected. For the duration, you and any ally in range (when you initially activated this move) have resistance to electric-type attacks. If you were already resistant, you are now immune. If you were vulnerable, you now take regular damage. If you are immune to electric-type moves already, nothing happens.
name: Mud Sport

Description: You fire a glob of mud at a creature, dealing damage with a chance to hinder the target's movement. Make a ranged attack against a creature in range, dealing ground damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is higher than 15, the target's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Mud Shot

Description: You throw a hard-packed mud ball at a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing ground damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target has disadvantage on its next attack roll. If activating a move that requires a save, the target(s) have advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Mud Bomb

Description: A ray of sunlight shines upon you, basking you in healing light. The user gains hit points. If this move is activated at night, halve the total healing.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Morning Sun

Description: A ray of moonlight shines upon you, basking you in healing light. The user gains hit points. If this move is activated during the day, halve the total healing.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice roll for healing changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Moonlight

Description: You emit a sinister ray that explodes out from you in a 100 foot line, 5 feet wide. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ghost damage on a failure or half as much on a success. This attack ignores any of the creatures abilities that would affect the user's ability to hit or deal full damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Moongeist Beam

Description: You summon forth a powerful moonbeam that strikes a creature. Make a ranged attack on a target in range, dealing fairy damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or more, the target has disadvantage on its next attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Moonblast

Description: You cover the ground in a thin, healing mist that surrounds a 120 foot circle, centered on you. For 3 turns, no grounded creatures inside the mist can suffer from new status conditions. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability.
name: Misty Terrain

Description: A light mist surrounds a target, offering a protective barrier. The target is immune to negative stat changes for the duration, but any current effects are still in place.
name: Mist

Description: You fire an explosive ball of damaging mist at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack against a target, doing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is higher than 10, the target has disadvantage on any attack it makes before the end of its next turn..
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Mist Ball

Description: You loose a damaging flash of light from your polished body. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing steel damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target has disadvantage on its next attack roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Mirror Shot

Description: You mimic a target that you can see, in range. When you activate this move, choose a target in range and fully execute the most recent move used by the creature, using your own ability scores, level, and typing for saving throw DC, attack, and damage.
name: Mirror Move

Description: When subject to a ranged attack, you can attempt to decrease the damage and send some back at the attacker in range. Using this reaction, the damage is decreased by . If this causes the damage to fall below zero, the attack is deflected and you may make a ranged attack roll to send it back at the attacker for psychic damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Mirror Coat

Description: You flash your eyes at the target, stunning them briefly and lowering their defenses. When activating this move, choose a target in range and force them to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, any modifiers to their AC are reset, and if they are Dark or Ghost-type, their immunities are relinquished for the duration. If, when losing immunity, the target's secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to an attack of that type, it follows the secondary type for that effect.
name: Miracle Eye

Description: You appear smaller to your creatures, increasing your evasion. For the duration, you gain an additional +2 to your AC.
name: Minimize

Description: You sense the motives and moves of a creature around you. When this move is activated, a single attack roll you make next turn is guaranteed to hit. You may roll to see if you crit or cause an effect from a high roll. This move does not affect one-shot moves like Fissure, Guillotine, etc.
name: Mind Reader

Description: You fill your head with hot fire that explodes around you. Force all creaatures within 15 feet of you to make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. After activating this move, you take an amount of typless damage equal to the full damage as if you failed the save.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 6d8 at level 10, and 6d12 at level 17.
name: Mind Blown

Description: You copy another creature's movements, learning its ways in battle. When used, this move is temporarily replaced by your choice of one of the target's moves. The target can be an ally. After one PP is subtracted to use this move, the replacement move will retain Mimic's remaining PP. The user can select any of the target's moves to copy for the duration.
name: Mimic

Description: You create a tasty drink that heals your or an ally's wounds. The recipient gains hit points.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice roll for this move changes to 3d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Milk Drink

Description: You summon a move at random to inflict against a creature. When you use this move, roll a d100. The resulting number is the TM number for the move you make. If the move is unable to be completed because of positioning, range, etc., Metronome fails.
name: Metronome

Description: You smash a creature with a fist as fast as a meteor strike. Make a melee attack against a creature, doing steel damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, your next attack has advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Meteor Mash

Description: You emit an ear-shattering high pitched sound that only your target can hear, leaving them in a defenseless state. When activating this move, a target must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, all attack rolls against the target are given a +5 bonus until the end of your next turn.
name: Metal Sound

Description: You strike out with sharp claws. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing steel damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, your next attack gets an additional +1 to hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Metal Claw

Description: You lash out in retaliation with a bust of harsh metal shards. As a reaction, when you are hit with a melee attack that deals damage, make a melee attack roll against your attacker, with disadvantage. On a hit, deal the same amount of steel type damage back at your attacker (maximum of 5x your current level).
name: Metal Burst

Description: You sacrifice your life force to leave a lasting mark on a target. When you activate this move, you touch a creature and drop to 0 hit points. As a result, the target is incapacitated for 2 rounds. All attacks against it have advantage, it automatically fails all STR and DEX saving throws by the maximum amount, and it cannot attack, move, flee, or be switched out.
name: Memento

Description: You charge at a creature for a devastating horn attack. Make a melee attack roll, doing bug damage on a hit. If you moved 20 feet or more straight towards a target, immediately before activating this move, force a creature to make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Megahorn

Description: You strike out with a hard punch Make a melee attack against a target, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Mega Punch

Description: You strike out with a hard kick. Make a melee attack against a target, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Mega Kick

Description: You attempt to drain the life force of a target. Make a ranged attack on a target, doing grass damage on a hit. Half of the damage dealt is restored to the user.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Mega Drain

Description: You become one with your inner self. For the duration, you gain +1 to attack rolls and saving throws.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The bonus changes to +2 at level 5, +3 at level 10, and +4 at level 17.
name: Meditate

Description: You flash an intimidating look at a target, attempting to freeze them in fear. Force a target in range to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target cannot flee or be switched out for 3 rounds.
name: Mean Look

Description: When targeted by or forced to make a saving throw from a single-target move, you may use your reaction to copy the creature's move against it, after activation but before the effects. If the move requires an attack roll, you have disadvantage on the attack. If the move requires a saving throw, the target has advantage on the roll. If the move causes damage, double the damage dice. The damage/effect tier for the move is based off of your level, not the target's.
name: Me First

Description: You conjure up a ethereal, protective mat to shield you and your allies. Until the end of your next turn, any ally creature within 15 feet of you (including you) is immune to damage from damaging moves. Status-inducing moves can still affect their targets.
name: Mat Block

Description:
You shake the ground with an earth-shattering quake. All creature in range must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking half damage on a success and full damage on a fail. Creatures in range that are burrowed or in the invulnerable stage of Dig take double damage from this move. Roll a d100 on the table below to determine damage. Raised creatures are immune to the effects and damage of this move.
- 
| d100  | Damage |
|:---:|:-----------:|
|  01-05  | 1d4+MOVE |
|  06-15  | 1d8+MOVE |
|  16-35  | 1d10+MOVE |
|  36-65  | 1d12+MOVE |
|  66-85  | 2d6+MOVE |
|  86-95  | 2d8+MOVE |
|  96-100  | 2d12+MOVE |
Scaling: Higher Levels: For damage rolls, use 2x Dice at level 5, 3x Dice at level 10, and 4x Dice at level 17.
name: Magnitude

Description: You use your electric energy to manipulate magnetic fields. Until the beginning of your next turn, any creature in range with the Plus or Minus ability gains a bonus to their AC equal to your proficiency modifier, and any saving throw they are forced to make is rolled with advantage.
name: Magnetic Flux

Description: You use magnetic power within yourself to raise yourself from the ground, becoming immune to ground moves for the duration.
name: Magnet Rise

Description: You hurl a steel ball that seeks out a creature in range, never missing. This move is guaranteed to hit for steel damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Magnet Bomb

Description: You stir up a maelstrom of fire in a 40 foot circle, centered on a point within range, that continues to rage as long as you hold your concentration. Any creature that enters this area for the first time on their turn, or is in that area at the beginning of their turn must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Magma Storm

Description: You summon a sharp, magical leaf that strikes a creature. This move is guaranteed to hit for grass damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Magical Leaf

Description: You employ your psychic power to suppress the effect of all held items in a 100 foot circle, centered on you.
name: Magic Room

Description: A flash of magical energy forms between you and a creature, reflecting negative energy back at an attacker in range. When an attack from a creature causes you to suffer from a negative status condition, they are also affected by the same condition.
name: Magic Coat

Description: You rush forward to punch with incredible speed. Choose a target within 10 feet of you. You rush forward to slam a fist into the creature, avoiding all attacks of opportunity. Make a melee attack on that creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Mach Punch

Description: You create a blinding bright light that damages creature's eyes and may lower their defense. Creatures in range must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. For creatures that fail by 5 or more, any attack against them has advantage until the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
name: Luster Purge

Description: You make a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. Make a melee attack, doing bug damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the target has disadvantage on its next attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Lunge

Description: You sacrifice yourself for another one of your trainer's Pokémon. When activating this move, the user faints, but the next creature released by its trainer is fully healed and cured of any status effects.
name: Lunar Dance

Description: When a creature scores a critical hit on you or an ally in range, you may use your reaction to quickly recite a magical incantation that treats the attack like a normal hit, preventing the extra damage and/or effect of the crit.
name: Lucky Chant

Description: You sweep your legs at the lower half of a creature's body. Make a melee attack roll, dealing fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, target must succeed on a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Low Sweep

Description: You kick out at a creature's lower half, dealing damage and attempting to knock it off balance. Make a melee attack, doing fighting damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Low Kick

Description: You blow a kiss to a creature, attempting to put the target to sleep. The target must make a CHA save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.
name: Lovely Kiss

Description: You hone in on your target, ready to strike. When this move is activated, a single attack roll you make next turn is guaranteed to hit. You may roll to see if you crit or cause an effect from a high roll. This move does not affect one-shot moves like Fissure, Guillotine, etc.
name: Lock-On

Description: You attempt to slam a full-force blast of water into a target in range. Make a ranged attack, doing water damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target's AC is reduced by 1 while it remains in battle. This decrease may be stacked up to a maximum of -5 to AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Liquidation

Description: When you are subject to a ranged attack, use your reaction to take half the damage dealt now and on any ranged attack that targets you until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Light Screen

Description: You draw forth a powerful natural essence, concentrating it into a beam of light 80ft long and 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the blast must make DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking fairy damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The user takes typeless recoil damage equal to half the damage roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Light of Ruin

Description: You reach out and lick a target. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, do ghost damage. On a natural attack roll of 18 or higher, the target becomes paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Lick

Description: You stare down a target, reducing its will. The creature must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies may add +1 to any attack they target it with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple leer saves, up to a maximum of +5.
name: Leer

Description: You send a seed at a creature in range that implants itself in their hide. Make a ranged attack roll. On a hit, a seed implants into their skin. The target takes grass damage at the end of each of its subsequent turns until it faints or is switched out. Half of the damage is restored by the attacker, or any other active creature the trainer has in battle, even if the original attacker faints or is returned to its Pokéball. Only one creature can be seeded by the attacker at a time. Grass-type creatures are immune to the damage from this move.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 2d6 at level 10, and 2d8 at level 17.
name: Leech Seed

Description: You attempt to suck away some of a creature's life force. Make a melee attack roll, doing bug damage on a hit. Half of the damage done is restored to the user.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Leech Life

Description: You summon a flurry of leaves to pelt a target. Make a ranged attack, doing grass damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Leafage

Description: You summon forth a cyclone of harsh winds and fast moving leaves that rushes forward to strike a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing grass damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target has disadvantage on its next attack. If the target activates a move that requires a saving throw, its target(s) have advantage on the roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Leaf Tornado

Description: You whip up a powerful storm of leaves in a 40 foot circle, centered on a point within range. All creatures in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking grass damage on a fail, or half as much on a success. After activating this move, you are sapped of energy. On any damaging move you activate before the end of your next turn, reduce the damage dealt by your MOVE modifier.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Leaf Storm

Description: You attempt to slash a creature with a sharp leaf. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing grass damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical on 19 and 20.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Leaf Blade

Description: You summon forth a plume of raging hot fire in a 5 foot radius, 40-foot cylinder, centered on a point within range. Creatures in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure and becoming burned, or half as much without becoming burned on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Lava Plume

Description: You lash out an a creature with a furious strike. This move can only be activated when all other known moves by a user have been activated in the same combat. If the user is switched out, this rule resets. Make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Last Resort

Description: When activating this move, you spend your action concentrating intensely. If you keep your concentration, your first atack on your next turn always results in a critical hit.
name: Laser Focus

Description: You gather in the natural energy of the land around you and focus it into a sudden eruption of earth in a 40 ft radius, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Land's Wrath

Description: You attempt to rid a creature of their held item for the rest of battle. Make a melee attack roll against a target. On a hit, deal dark damage and any held item of the target disappears. The item appears back in the target's inventory when the battle is over.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Knock Off

Description: Your body is cloaked with a protective shield that negates all damage to you. When targeted by an attack, you may automatically avoid taking damage from this attack and any other damaging move until the beginning of your next turn. On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.
name: King's Shield

Description: You move with incredible speed. Increase your walking, flying, or swimming speed by 20 if it is greater than 0, and add +2 to AC when targeted by ranged attacks for the duration. This move cannot be stacked.
name: Kinesis

Description: You extend a hand towards a target creature for a savage karate chop. Make a melee attack roll, doing fighting damage on a hit. Karate Chop scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Karate Chop

Description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to a creature. Make a melee attack against a target, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Jump Kick

Description: You send powerful missiles of pure energy to rain down on any creature in a 80 foot circle, centered on a point in range. Any creature caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The type of the damage depends on the kind of plate the user is holding.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Judgment

Description: You swing your tail out, attempting to crush a creature. Make an attack roll on a creature in range, doing steel damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is a 19 or 20, the target's AC is decreased by 1 for the rest of combat.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Iron Tail

Description: You slam into the target with your hard head. Make a melee attack, dealing steel damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Iron Head

Description: Your body temporarily becomes solid as steel plate. Until the end of your next turn, you gain + 6 to your AC and have resistance to all types of damage. If you were vulnerable, you now take regular damage. If you were already resistant, you become immune.
name: Iron Defense

Description: You disperse electric particles that charge the battlefield. Until the beginning of your next turn, any normal-type move activated within 50 feet of you is considered electric-type.
name: Ion Deluge

Description: You instruct a creature to act again. As an action, choose a target in range. The target must immediately repeat the move they used in their last action or bonus action, without spending the PP.
name: Instruct

Description: You pierce the ground with roots, absorbing natural energy and fixing you in place. At the end of each of your next three turns (including this one), heal yourself for hit points. For the duration of this move, your movement speed drops to zero and you may not flee or be switched out by your trainer unless forced by an opponent's moves or abilities.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Ingrain

Description: You summon an infestation of tiny insects to attack a creature for multiple turns. Make a ranged attack on a target. On a hit, the target takes bug damage and becomes infested with swarming bugs. As long as you maintain concentration, the target takes an additional bug damage at the end of each of its next three turns.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Infestation

Description: You engulf a target in intense flames. Make a ranged attack against a target, dealing fire damage on a hit, burning the target in the process.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Inferno

Description: You summon forth a burning hot flame that surrounds a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. On a hit, if the target is holding a berry, it is immediately burned to ash, becoming unusable.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Incinerate

Description: You create psychic walls within the mind of a target in range. Force the target to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target is unable to use any Move it knows that is the same as yours for the duration.
name: Imprison

Description: You create an icy wind that gusts towards a creature in range. Make a ranged attack against a creature, doing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target falls prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Icy Wind

Description: Your pummel a creature in range with multiple sharp shards of ice. Make a ranged attack roll, doing ice damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional ice damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Icicle Spear

Description: You generate a row of icicles that crash down on top of a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing ice damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Icicle Crash

Description: You flash freeze chunks of ice and quickly hurl them at a creature. As a bonus action, you fire a shard of ice at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Ice Shard

Description: You strike out with ice-infused fists. Make a melee attack roll, doing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Ice Punch

Description: You swing and hit with your strong, heavy fist. Make a melee attack dealing ice damage. Until the beginning of your next turn, you have disadvantage on all DEX saves and your speed is halved.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Ice Hammer

Description: You attempt to pierce a creature with ice-infused fangs. Make a melee attack, dealing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen and flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Ice Fang

Description: When you use this move, you charge up an intense power within your body. On your next turn's action, if you keep your concentration, you unleash an ultracold, freezing wind in a 60 foot circle all around you. Anyone caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ice damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If any creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Ice Burn

Description: You create a 80 foot line of freezing ice, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC or take ice damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail this save by 5 or more become frozen.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Ice Beam

Description: You roll into a rock-hard ball of ice and continue to pummel a creature. When you activate this move, make a melee attack on a target in range, doing ice damage on a hit. If you use this move on your turn in consecutive rounds, double the dice roll for damage each time you hit. The multiplier maxes out at 8x the original damage. The damage resets if any of the attacks miss, or if you are incapacitated.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d8 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Ice Ball

Description: You attempt to put the target to sleep. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.
name: Hypnosis

Description: You create a hyperspace portal that allows you to instantly teleport to a creature in range and strike out with a melee attack. This move is guaranteed to hit for psychic damage. Reactions that negate damage such as Protect or Detect cannot be used.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Hyperspace Hole

Description: Using your many arms, you send a barrage of three balls of furious energy at any creature(s) in range. Each ball automatically deals 1d6 dark damage to any creature(s) you choose. Reactions that negate damage such as Protect or Detect cannot be used. After activating this move, any attacks against you, until the beginning of your next turn, are rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: You can fire 4 projectiles at level 5, 5 projectiles at level 10, and 6 projectiles at level 17.
name: Hyperspace Fury

Description: You release a loud and startling, high-pitched sound that only a creature can hear. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature in range, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Hyper Voice

Description: You lash out at a creature with a quick fang attack. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. Hyper Fang scores a critical hit on 19 and 20. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Hyper Fang

Description: You unleash a concentrated beam of pure energy in a 80 foot line, 5ft wide. Any creature caught in the line must succeed on a DEX save or take normal damage on a fail and half as much on a save. This move cannot be used on consecutive turns by the same creature.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Hyper Beam

Description: You send a surge of powerful water towards creatures in a 80 foot line, 5 feet wide. Creatures caught in the blast must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking water damage on a failed save, and half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Hydro Pump

Description: You fire a powerful stream of high-speed water at creatures in a 80 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the blast must make a STR saving throw against your Move DC, taking water damage on a failure, and half as much on a success.. Creatures that fail the save also are pushed back 10 feet and fall prone. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Hydro Cannon

Description: You whip up a maelstrom of harsh winds. Each creature in a 30 ft radius, centered on a point within range, must make a STR saving throw against your Move DC, taking flying damage and knocked prone on a failure, or half as much damage without being knocked prone on a success. Targets that fail the saving throw by 5 or more become confused. If this attack is activated during rain, the targets roll their saving throws with disadvantage. If used during harsh sunlight, the targets roll their saves with advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Hurricane

Description: You pierce the air with an intimidating howl. Until the end of your next turn, allies (and you) have advantage on any melee attack rolls they make against a creature within 5 feet of you.
name: Howl

Description: You sink your horns into a creature, draining some of their power. Make a melee attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. Half the damage dealt is recovered by the user (rounded down).
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Horn Leech

Description: You attempt to drill your horn through a target creature with tremendous strength. Roll a d20. On a 20, the creature is impaled and immediately faints. On any other roll, you miss and this move fails. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.
name: Horn Drill

Description: You strike at a target with your horn. Make a melee attack, doing normal damage on a hit. If you moved 20 feet or more straight towards a target, immediately before activating this move, force a creature to make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Horn Attack

Description: You sharpen your claws to increase the power of your attacks. For the duration, add an additional +1 to your attack and damage rolls. This move may be stacked to a maximum of +3 to attack and damage rolls.
name: Hone Claws

Description: If you are within melee range of an ally, you grasp its hand to spread happiness. Use this reaction when an ally is attacking to add +1 to its attack rolls, or when it is targeted by an attack to add +1 to its AC. This reaction can be used only before the result of either attack roll (by ally or creature) is called.
name: Hold Hands

Description: You lash out with force, but contain your strike to a glancing blow, leaving a creature conscious. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. This attack will always leave its target with 1 hp if it would otherwise cause the target to faint.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Hold Back

Description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to a target. Make a melee attack, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: High Jump Kick

Description: You fiercely attack the target using your entire body. Make a melee attack, dealing ground damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: High Horsepower

Description: You unleash a wave of force of unknown power at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack on a creature, doing damage of a random type. Roll a d20 to determine which type of damage is dealt. |d20|Type|d20|Type |:-:|:-:|:-:|:-: |1 |Normal|11 |Psychic |2 |Fire|12 |Bug |3 |Water |13 |Rock |4 |Electric |14 |Ghost |5 |Grass |15 |Dragon |6 |Ice |16 |Dark |7 |Fighting |17 |Steel |8 |Poison |18 |Fairy |9 | Ground |19 |Roll Again |10| Flying|20|Roll Again
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Hidden Power

Description: You send a ghostly energy at a creature that does additional damage to those affected by status conditions. Make a ranged attack, dealing ghost damage on a hit. If the target is affected by a status condition, double your MOVE modifier when adding damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Hex

Description: You can use a bonus action on your turn to choose one ally other than yourself within 60 feet of you who can hear you. That ally can add a d6 to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next 10 minutes, before the result of the roll is called by the DM. An ally being helped can only have one d6 available at a time.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The helping dice for this move changes to d8 at level 5, d10 at level 10, and d12 at level 17.
name: Helping Hand

Description: You slam into a creature with your heavy body. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing a minimum of steel damage on a hit. Add an additional bonus to damage equal to your MOVE modifier for each size level you are above a creature. (Sizes, in order, are: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large, Huge, Gargantuan)
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Heavy Slam

Description: You exhale a wave of hot breath in a 30ft. circle, centered on you. Creatures caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on failure, or half as much on a success. If the creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Heat Wave

Description: You slam into a creature with your flaming body. Make a melee attack on a target, dealing a minimum of fire damage on a hit. Add an additional bonus to damage equal to your MOVE modifier for each size level you are above a creature. (Sizes, in order, are: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large, Huge, Gargantuan)
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Heat Crash

Description: Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, you employ your psychic power to swap any changes in ability modifiers, AC, attack changes, damage boosts, etc. that are currently in affect on you or the target.
name: Heart Swap

Description: You unleash a vicious blow after acting cute. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing psychic damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Heart Stamp

Description: You sacrifice yourself for another one of your trainer's Pokémon. When activating this move, the user faints, but the next conscious creature released by its trainer is healed of all status effects and recovers an amount of HP equal to what the user lost by fainting.
name: Healing Wish

Description: You emit a healing pulse that restores a target's HP. Choose a target in range (cannot be yourself). The target regains hit points.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Heal Pulse

Description: You summon forth your underlings to heal your wounds. Regain hit points.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 3d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Heal Order

Description: When a creature within range attempts to use an HP recovery move, item, or ability, you may use your reaction to send psychic waves into the mind of the target, preventing the recovery of health.
name: Heal Block

Description: You ring a bell that chimes beautifully across the battlefield. All active allied creature in a 120 foot circle, centered on you, are healed of their negative status effects.
name: Heal Bell

Description: You really know how to use your head. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target falls prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Headbutt

Description: You lower your head to deliver a dangerous headbutt. Make a melee attack, dealing rock damage on a hit. On a hit, the user takes 1/2 the damage dealt in typeless recoil.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Head Smash

Description: You lower your head and charge at a creature. Make a melee attack. On a hit, you deal normal damage, taking a quarter of the total damage (rounded down) in typeless recoil.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Head Charge

Description: You create a haze of light snow that washes over creatures in a 60 foot circle, centered on you. Any stat changes, status effects, shields or other outside forces affecting creatures in range are removed. This includes things like Leech Seed, Focus Energy, Substitute, Iron Defense, Disable, etc.
name: Haze

Description: You increase your defense, able to reduce incoming damage. After activating this move, reduce any damage dealt to you by until the beginning of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Harden

Description: You celebrate your impending victory with a little jig. Prize money awarded at the end of battle is doubled.
name: Happy Hour

Description: You put all your power into a strong and heavy fist attack. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. Until the beginning of your next turn, you have disadvantage on all DEX saves and your speed is halved.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Hammer Arm

Description: You stir up a massive hail storm in a 50 foot radius, centered on a point in range. When a non ice-type creature enters the area for the first time on their turn, or begins their turn inside the area, they take an amount of ice damage equal to half your level, rounded up.  The hail storm lasts for 5 rounds.
name: Hail

Description: You tackle a creature with a high-speed spin. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing steel damage on a hit. If your DEX score is lower than the target's, double the dice roll for damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Gyro Ball

Description: You create a strong wind that batters a target in range. Make a ranged attack, doing flying damage on a hit.
