Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Gust

Description: You fire a wad of icky gunk at a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Gunk Shot

Description: You are filled with an incredible rage, grabbing the head of a target creature in an attempt to squeeze the life from it. Roll a d20. On a 20, you instantly cause the creature to faint. On any other roll, this move has no effect. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.
name: Guillotine

Description: You use your psychic power to swap defenses with a creature. Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, switch armor class with the target for the duration.
name: Guard Swap

Description: You use your psychic power to change your defense to match the target's the best you can. Force a creature in range to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, for the duration, your AC changes to become an average of your current AC and the target's, rounded down.
name: Guard Split

Description: When you take damage from a move that reduces you to zero hit points, you may use your reaction to force the attacker to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, all PP from the move that caused you to faint is depleted .
name: Grudge

Description: You increase the size of a target. When you use this move, a creature in range (or you) grows slightly larger, gaining the ability to add a d4 to any attack roll or saving throw for the duration.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice to add increases to 1d6 at level 10.
name: Growth

Description: You target a creature with an intimidating growl. The creature must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, it adds -1 to any attack it makes for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple growl saves, up to a maximum of -5.
name: Growl

Description: You strengthen gravity in an 40 foot circle, centered on you. Any creature in the area cannot use moves like Fly or Bounce, flying types lose their ground immunity, and the Levitate ability is suppressed.
name: Gravity

Description: Grass sprouts from the ground in a circle around you, coating the earth with healing energy. For 3 turns, all creatures in the affected area heal for an amount of hit points equal to their proficiency bonus at the end of their turn. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability. In addition, creatures may double their MOVE modifier on damage rolls from grass-type moves activated inside the area.
name: Grassy Terrain

Description: You make a shrill sound that has the chance to put a creature to sleep. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a failure.
name: Grass Whistle

Description: You send a column of thick grass towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. After you land a hit, any ally that uses another Pledge move in the same round automatically hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Grass Pledge

Description: You attempt to ensnare a creature with vines that sprout from the ground, causing it to trip. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. If the targets size is Large or bigger, double the dice roll for the damage. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target falls prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Grass Knot

Description: You stare into the depths of a creature's eyes with intense ferocity. The creature must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC or become frightened for the duration. A creature frightened in this way must make a WIS save against your Move DC at the end of each of its turns to remove the effect.
name: Glare

Description: You blow a wind of freezing cold air at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit. On a hit, reduce the target's speed by 5 feet. A target reduced to a speed of 0 in this manner becomes frozen. The target may use an action at any time (before becoming frozen) to warm its body, resetting its speed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Glaciate

Description: You charge at a creature with every ounce of your power. Make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit. This move cannot be used on consecutive turns by the same creature.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Giga Impact

Description: You attempt to drain the life force of a target. Make a ranged attack on a target, doing grass damage on a hit. Half of the damage dealt is restored to the user.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Giga Drain

Description: You spend time to absorb the natural energy around you, sharply increasing your effect in battle. When you activate this move, your speed increases by 10 feet and all of your attacks and saving throws are rolled with advantage for three rounds.
name: Geomancy

Description: You engage your gears to raise the attack of ally creatures in range with the Plus or Minus ability. While you maintain your concentration, Pokémon under the affects of Gear Up have advantage on all attack rolls.
name: Gear Up

Description: You send a pair of steel gears at a target(s) in range. Make two ranged attacks, dealing steel damage with each hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Gear Grind

Description: You hurl stomach acid towards a target. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, the target is covered in the disgusting substance and cannot benefit from the effect of any of its abilities for the duration.
name: Gastro Acid

Description: You save an attack to unleash at a later time. When you activate this move, you may choose to attack on this turn, or delay the attack. You may use the attack as a free action at any time during the next three rounds. When you make the attack, make a ranged attack roll, dealing psychic damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Future Sight

Description: You summon a gigantic fireball that strikes down from the heavens in a 60 foot circle, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If Fusion Bolt was already used this round, double the damage dealt. Fusion Flare may be used to thaw out the user from the frozen status before attacking.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Fusion Flare

Description: You summon a gigantic lightning bolt that strikes down from the heavens in a 60 foot circle, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking electric damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If Fusion Flare was already used this round, double the damage dealt.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Fusion Bolt

Description: You reach out and unleash relentless claw attacks against a creature. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Fury Swipes

Description: You unleash series of cuts against a creature that increase in strength. When you activate this move, make a melee attack on a target in range, doing bug damage on a hit. If you use this move on your turn in consecutive rounds, double the dice roll for damage each time you hit. The multiplier maxes out at 8x the original damage. The damage resets if any of the attacks miss, or if you are incapacitated.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Fury Cutter

Description: You reach out and unleash relentless strikes against a creature. Make a melee attack roll, doing normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Fury Attack

Description: You lash out at a creature, venting your frustration at your trainer. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing normal damage on a hit. When you make this attack, add an additional bonus to hit and damage equal to the number of levels you are below zero on the Loyalty Chart. This move bypasses the Loyalty penalty roll, except for uncontrollable creatures based on SR limitations.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Frustration

Description: You blow a gust of freezing cold air at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on natural attack rolls of 16 and higher.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Frost Breath

Description: You summon a whirlwind of jagged branches and razor sharp leaves that batter all creatures in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. All creature caught in the flurry must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking grass damage on a failure, and half as much on a success. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Frenzy Plant

Description: You unleash a freezing cold air that rapidly chills a creature in range. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen. This move deals super effective damage to water-type creatures. If the target's secondary type is resistant to ice damage, this move deals standard damage instead.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Freeze-Dry

Description: When you use this move, you charge up a ball of rock-hard ice. On your next turn's action, if you keep your concentration, you fire your electrically charged ice at a creature. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing ice damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 15 or more, the target is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Freeze Shock

Description: You turn a creature's own power against it. Make a melee attack roll using your MOVE power. On a hit, the target takes an amount of dark damage equal to + the target's level.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Foul Play

Description: You summon the energy of the forest to change the type of another creature. Force a creature in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, its type is changed to Grass through their next three turns in battle.
name: Forest's Curse

Description: You grant yourself a brief but incredible sixth sense. On the next ghost-, normal-, or fighting-type move you activate, ignore any immunities of the target creature(s) granted by their Pokémon type. If the target's secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the attack, it follows the secondary type for that effect.
name: Foresight

Description: You thrust your palm outward with such strength that a shockwave is sent towards a creature. Make a ranged or melee attack roll, depending on your target. If used as a melee attack, deal fighting damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is paralyzed. If used as a ranged attack, the damage is halved with no chance to paralyze.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Force Palm

Description: You act quickly to entice an enemy to attack you. When a creature in range activates a Move that directly targets another creature, you may use your reaction to force the creature to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a fail, the Move must target you instead. If you are out of range of the Move, the creature must use their remaining movement to move in a straight line towards you before making the attack (does not provoke attacks of opportunity). If you are still out of range, the move automatically fails.
name: Follow Me

Description: When activating this move, you spend your action focusing your next attack. If you keep concentration, as an action on your next turn, make an attack roll against a creature, doing fighting damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Focus Punch

Description: You shut your eyes and focus in on the energy inside you before striking. For the duration, increase your critical range by 2 (From 20 to 18+ , from 19+ to 17+, etc.). This move is not stackable.
name: Focus Energy

Description: You heighten your focus and unleash it upon a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Focus Blast

Description: You dive at a creature with quick reaction speed, able to change the type of attack when you reach them. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing flying OR fighting damage, depending on your choice. STAB can only added to this move if its type is fighting.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Flying Press

Description: You fly high into the air to prepare for a dive bomb attack. When you activate this move, you use 10 feet of your movement to vanish and fly upwards, remaining in an invulnerable state until your next turn. During this time, you are immune to the damage and effects of any move. If you have no remaining movement or are grappled/restrained before activating this move, the move fails. On your next turn, you use your action to reappear and make a diving melee attack on a creature in range, with advantage, dealing flying damage on a successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Fly

Description: Large flowers sprout from any grass-type allies in range, boosting their defense. For one minute, as long as you keep your concentration, grass-type allies in a 30 foot circle, centered on you, gain +2 to their AC.
name: Flower Shield

Description: You extend a healing energy to recover the hit points of a creature in range. The target gains hit points. If the terrain is grassy, double your MOVE modifier.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Floral Healing

Description:
You sacrifice your held item to throw it a creature. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, the amount of dark damage dealt is equal to the price of the item in the manual, divided by 100 (rounded down), plus STAB (if applicable). After activating this move, on a hit or miss, the item disappears. In addition, certain items have additional effects on a successful hit with this move. After activating this move, on a hit or miss, the item disappears.

| Item  | Effect |
|:---:|:-----------:|
|  Flame Orb  | Burns |
|  Toxic Orb  | Badly Poisons |
|  Light Ball  | Paralyzes|

| Item    | Effect |
|:---:|:-----------:|
|  King's Rock  | Flinches |
|  Razor Fang  | Flinches |
|  Poison Barb  | Poisons |
name: Fling

Description: You unleash a beam of energy in a 80 foot line, 5 feet wide. All creatures in its path must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fairy damage on a hit, or half as much on a save. After activating this move, your next attack is rolled at disadvantage. If the next attack requires a saving throw, the target(s) has advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Fleur Cannon

Description: You send mixed signals to an creature in range. Force a target in range to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target is confused, but it adds +2 to its attack rolls while confused.
name: Flatter

Description: You emit an immense flash of light in a 20 foot radius circle, centered on you. Creatures in the area must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, they are blinded until the end of their next turn. Outside of combat, this move can be used to light a dim area, much like the "Light" cantrip.
name: Flash

Description: You gather energy from the light around you and send a concentrated beam towards a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing steel damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Flash Cannon

Description: You cloak yourself in fire and charge at a creature with serious damage. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing fire damage on a hit. On a hit, you take a quarter of the damage dealt in typeless recoil damage. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is burned. If the user is frozen, this move can still be used, thawing out the creature during the attack
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Flare Blitz

Description: You shoot a concentrated gout of flame in an 40 foot cone. Any creature caught in the cone must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half damage on a success. Any creature that fails the save by 5 or more becomes burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Flamethrower

Description: A wheel of flame explodes out from you in a 10 foot radius. All creature in the area must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a fail and half as much on a save. If the user is frozen, this move can still be used, thawing out the creature during the attack
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Flame Wheel

Description: You cloak yourself with flame and lash out at a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. With each successful hit from this move, increase your movement speed by 5 until you are incapacitated, are switched out, or the combat ends. (Maximum of +30 to movement speed)
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Flame Charge

Description: You release a fireball that explodes on contact. Choose a point in range. Any creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a hit, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Flame Burst

Description: You flail about with a wild strike that increases in power the more injured you are. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing normal damage on a hit. If you are below 50% of your maximum health, double the damage. If you are at 10% or below of your maximum health, triple the damage. The multiplier for this attack occurs before the multiplier for resistances or vulnerabilities.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Flail

Description: You crack open the ground with devastating force. Choose a target in range and roll a d20. On a 20, the target falls into the crack and vanished into the abyss. On any other roll, or if targeting a flying creature, this move has no effect. The area in a 20 foot radius around the target becomes difficult terrain. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.
name: Fissure

Description: You make quite the entrance, quickly attacking a creature. This attack can only be used on the first turn that the user has entered combat. Make a melee attack on a creature, doing bug damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: First Impression

Description: You release a series of moving flames that dance around a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing fire damage on a hit. as the flames swirl around it. As long as you maintain concentration, the target takes an additional fire damage at the end of each of its next three turns.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Fire Spin

Description: You strike out with fire-infused fists. Make a melee attack roll, doing fire damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Fire Punch

Description: You send a plume of flame towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. After you land a hit, any ally that uses another Pledge move in the same round automatically hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Fire Pledge

Description: You strike out at a target in range with a burning lash, Make a melee attack on a creature, doing fire damage. On a successful attack, the targeted creature must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack targeted at the creature for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple Fire Lash saves, up to a maximum of +5.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Fire Lash

Description: You attempt to pierce a creature with flame-cloaked fangs. Make a melee attack, dealing fire damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is burned and flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Fire Fang

Description: Two pillars of raging hot flames explode out from you and leap towards up to two creature in range. The creature(s) targeted must succeed on a DEX save against your Move DC for each pillar, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by 5 or more become burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Fire Blast

Description: You risk everything and use your own life force to damage a creature in range. When you activate this move, you faint, and force a target in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. The target takes an amount of fighting damage equal to your remaining HP on a failure, or half as much on a success
name: Final Gambit

Description: You dance and flap your wings, sending flames in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. Anyone caught in the blaze must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, double the MOVE modifier when adding damage
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Fiery Dance

Description: You lunge at a creature with a devastating sting attack. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing bug damage on a hit. If this attack causes the target to faint, double your ability modifier for attack rolls and damage on your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Fell Stinger

Description: You fake out a creature before you strike. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. If a creature attempts to use a Protect or Detect reaction against the damage, it fails.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Feint

Description: You bring a creature close and hit it with a sucker punch. Make a melee attack on a creature, at advantage, dealing dark damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Feint Attack

Description: You distract a creature in range with a beautiful dance. The target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, the target cannot add proficiency to its attack rolls for the duration.
name: Feather Dance

Description: You swipe at a creature but hold back power slightly. Make a melee attack against a creature, doing normal damage on a hit. If this attack would normally cause a creature to faint, it is reduced to 1HP instead.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: False Swipe

Description: You fake a creature out with superficial tears, lowering their defenses. When activating this move, a target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, all attack rolls against the target are given a +5 bonus until the end of your next turn.
name: Fake Tears

Description: This attack can only be used on the first turn that the user has entered combat. Make a melee attack on a creature, doing normal damage on a hit, causing the target to flinch.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Fake Out

Description: You stir up a series of vicious fairy winds that fly towards a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll against a target, dealing fairy damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Fairy Wind

Description: You summon forth a mystical power that locks down the battlefield. Creatures within a 80 foot circle, centered on you, may not flee or be switched out on their next turn.
name: Fairy Lock

Description: You strike out at a creature with revenge. Make a melee attack roll against a target, dealing normal damage on a hit. If you are poisoned, paralyzed, or burned, double the dice for the damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Facade

Description: You rush to attack with incredible speed. As a bonus action, you can immediately move up to 10ft and make a melee attack against a creature in range without taking an attack of opportunity, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Extreme Speed

Description: You create an irritating, damaging sound in the mind of a creature. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature in range, doing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Extrasensory

Description: You create a sphere of energy that packs a concentrated and devastating explosion. Choose a target within range and roll a d20. On a 20, the explosion goes off and all creature within 5 feet of that point faint  On any other roll, the explosion fails to go off and this move has no effect. If the target's level is 10 more than your own, this move automatically fails.
name: Explosion

Description: You spew hot magma in a 15 foot cone. Any creature caught in the blast must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If you are at full health when activating this move, double your STAB bonus when dealing damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Eruption

Description: You dance with a strange rhythm that causes a creature to mimic you. Choose a target in range and force them to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, choose one of their abilities to replace with one of your own for the duration.
name: Entrainment

Description: You draw in power from nature in a concentrated ball that you send towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing grass damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Energy Ball

Description: On an instance of taking damage that would otherwise cause you to faint, you may instead fall to 1HP on the first instance of this reaction. On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.
name: Endure

Description: When you activate this move, select a creature in range. the target must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failure, the target's current HP is reduced to be equal to your own. The hit point reduction can be no more than 5x the target's level. This move can not be used in the first round of combat.
name: Endeavor

Description: After being targeted by a move, force a creature to make a WIS save against your Move DC as a reaction. On a fail, the creature must target you with the same move used on their next turn, even if you may be out of range.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The number of turns the creature must use the move increases to 2 turns at level 10 and 3 turns at level 17.
name: Encore

Description: You hurl a ball of flame at a target within range. Make a ranged attack, doing fire damage on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target is burnt.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Ember

Description: You surround a creature in range with a dark aura. Force a creature to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target cannot gain the effect of any held item or trainer item given to it for the duration.
name: Embargo

Description: You unleash an electric net of web upon a creature. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing electric damage on a hit, and reducing the target's speed by 5 feet. The target can use an action on its turn remove any web from its body. A target whose speed is reduced to 0 is restrained.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Electroweb

Description: You hurl an electric orb at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing electric damage on a hit. Compare the target and user's highest speed type (walking, flying, etc.). If the user's speed is higher, roll the next tier's damage dice for this move. In the case of level 17 or higher, double the damage dice.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Electro Ball

Description: You suddenly surge with electric energy that transfers to your attacker. When hit by a melee attack, you may instantly use your reaction to force the attacker to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the attacking move's type is changed to "electric".
name: Electrify

Description: You electrify the ground around you to create a static field of electricity. For 3 turns, no grounded creatures inside the area can be asleep. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability. In addition, creatures may double their MOVE modifier on damage rolls from electric-type moves activated inside the area
name: Electric Terrain

Description: You hurl a hard egg at a creature that explodes on impact. Make a ranged attack on a creature, doing normal damage on a successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Egg Bomb

Description: Your body generates a strange pulsating sound that can disrupt creature's ability to attack. When you activate this move, any creature within 30 feet of you must make a CON saving throw against your Move DC. Any creature that fails flinches for 1d4 rounds.
name: Eerie Impulse

Description: You release a shout that echoes across the battlefield towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing normal damage on a hit. Until the beginning of your next turn, if any other creature in range uses this move, they may double their damage dice on a hit. This multiplier can continue to stack to a maximum of 8x the damage dice, resetting if any of the attacks miss.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Echoed Voice

Description: You create a tremor in the ground in a 20 foot radius, centered on you. Each creature in the area must succeed on a STR save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a fail and be knocked prone. On a success, they take half as much damage and are not knocked prone. Creatures in range that are burrowed or in the invulnerable stage of Dig take double damage from this move. After the move is activated, the area becomes difficult terrain. Raised creatures are immune to the effects and damage of this move.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Earthquake

Description: You cause the ground beneath a creature to erupt with power. Make a ranged attack, dealing ground damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Earth Power

Description: You strike out with a twirling punch that confuses a creature. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, it also becomes confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Dynamic Punch

Description: You lash out at a creature(s) with two quick strikes. Make two melee attack rolls, dealing dragon damage with each hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
name: Dual Chop

Description: You crash into a creature, spinning your body like a drill. Make a melee attack, dealing ground damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Drill Run

Description: You hammer down on a target with a peck attack. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing flying damage on a successful hit. Drill Peck scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Drill Peck

Description: You tap into a sleeping creature's dreams, sucking from its energy pool. Instantly inflict psychic damage on a sleeping target in range, regaining half as many hitpoints to yourself. This move does not wake a sleeping creature.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Dream Eater

Description: You attempt to zap the target's energy with a kiss. Make a melee attack roll on a creature, dealing fairy damage on a hit. The user is then healed for half the damage dealt.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Draining Kiss

Description: Your strike a target with an energy-draining punch. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit, gaining half the damage dealt (rounded down) in HP.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Drain Punch

Description: You whip your dragon tail at a creature in an attempt to send them away. Make a melee attack roll against a target, dealing dragon damage. In wild battles, the target takes the damage and flees from battle if its level is lower than that of the user. In trainer battles, the target takes the damage and must be immediately switched out for another creature in the trainer's party, if any remain.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Dragon Tail

Description: You rush at a creature with overwhelming menace. Make a melee attack, dealing dragon damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 17 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Dragon Rush

Description: You unleash a devastating flow of energy in a 100 foot long line, 5 feet wide. Each creature caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a save.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Dragon Rage

Description: You open your mouth and send a shockwave of draconic energy at a target in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing dragon damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Dragon Pulse

Description: You slam your head down like a hammer to attack a creature in range. Make a melee attack roll against the target, dealing dragon damage on a hit. Hit or miss, any creatures within the line created by the attack (5 feet wide) must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking the same damage on a failure.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Dragon Hammer

Description: You perform a mystical dance, pumping yourself up. For the duration, double your proficiency bonus when making an attack.
name: Dragon Dance

Description: You strike out with a powerful claw attack. Make a melee attack on a creature, doing dragon damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Dragon Claw

Description: You release a powerful breath of energy in a 40 foot cone. All targets caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a save. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Dragon Breath

Description: You soar upward and come crashing down towards a creature in range at tremendous speed. Make a melee attack roll, dealing flying damage on a hit. Any creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DEX save against your Move DC and take the same amount of damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. After activating this move, any attack roll that targets you until the beginning of your next turn is rolled with advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
name: Dragon Ascent

Description: You summon forth a meteor shower that rains down onto the battlefield. All creatures in a 20 foot circle, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a hit, or half as much on a save. After activating this move, your next attack is rolled at disadvantage. If that attack requires a saving throw, the target has advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Draco Meteor

Description: You commit a massive attack against a creature. Make a melee attack against a target, doing normal damage on a hit, but taking a quarter of the total damage (rounded down) in typeless recoil.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Double-Edge

Description: You create a duplicate image of yourself, 5 feet beside you. The image mimics you and attempt to fool your opponents into attacking it, instead. When subject to a damaging melee or ranged move with an area of effect of 5 feet wide or less, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, the image absorbs the damage and/or effects of the attack and disappears. Creatures with Truesight bypass the effect of this move. If grappled or restrained by a creature while Double Team is active, Double Team has no effect.
name: Double Team

Description: You reach out to slap a creature with quick strikes. Make a melee attack roll, doing on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Double Slap

Description: You strike twice with two devastating kicks. Make two melee attack rolls, doing fighting damage on each successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Double Kick

Description: You punch twice with two devastating slams of your fist. Make two melee attack rolls, doing steel damage on each successful hit. If any natural attack roll is 16 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Double Iron Bash

Description: You lash out quickly with two strikes. Make two melee attacks, dealing normal damage \on each hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Double Hit

Description: You promise doom upon a creature. When you activate this move, select a target and make an attack roll. On a hit, at the beginning of the third round after you activate this move, the target takes damage of no specific type. If the target is switched out, the damage is done to the trainer's current active Pokémon.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Doom Desire

Description: You strike out with a devastating punch. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target becomes confused. At level 17, a natural attack roll of 17 or more confuses the target.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Dizzy Punch

Description: When you activate this move, you use 10 feet of your movement to disappear into a magical space beneath your feet, remaining in an invulnerable state until your next turn. During this time, you are immune to the damage and effects of any move. If you have no remaining movement or are grappled/restrained before activating this move, the move fails. On your next turn, as an action, you reappear and attempt to attack a creature from below. Make a melee attack roll on a creature in range, with advantage, doing water damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Dive

Description: You let loose a flare of electricity in a 20 foot circle, centered on you, striking all creatures around you. Creatures in the area must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, a creature takes electric damage. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Discharge

Description: You let out a charming cry, dealing emotional damage to any creature in range that can hear you. This move automatically hits for fairy damage unless a creature is in the invulnerable stages of Fly, Dig, Bounce, etc.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Disarming Voice

Description: You attempt to disable a target, hindering its moves. Choose a target in range. The target must succeed on a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a failed save, the last Move it activated is unable to be used while you hold your concentration. (If this would end Solar Beam, Skull Bash, etc. during the charge phase of the Move, the Move automatically fails on the target's next turn).
name: Disable

Description: You burrow underground, disappearing from view before striking from underneath a target. When you activate this move, you use 10 feet of your movement to burrow underground (ignoring difficult terrain) and remain there until your next turn. During this time, you are immune to the damage and effects of any move. If you have no remaining movement or are grappled/restrained before activating this move, the move fails. On your next turn, you emerge from the ground and make a melee attack on a creature in range, with advantage, doing ground damage on a successful hit. If the target has Tremorsense, the attack is not rolled with advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Dig

Description: You stir up a massive storm of sharp diamonds in a 30 foot radius, centered on a point in range. When a creature enters the area for the first time on their turn, or begins their turn inside the area, they take rock damage. The Diamond Storm lasts for 3 rounds. When you activate this move, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, your AC is increased by 2 while the Diamond Storm is active.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Diamond Storm

Description: You sense incoming danger and are able to quickly avoid it. When you are the recipient of the damage and/or effects of a move, you may automatically avoid the damage/effects on the first instance of this reaction. On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful. This reaction may not be used to guard against the damage/effects that result from a natural 20 attack roll.
name: Detect

Description: You create a dark, internal bond with a creature. Select a target in range, who must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, half of any damage dealt to the user is also dealt as typeless damage to the target creature.
name: Destiny Bond

Description: You summon a swift, magical breeze in a 50 foot radius, centered on you, that sweeps away foggy weather and obstacles. When activating this move, any area of effect moves that are still active end immediately (Examples: Misty Terrain, Fog Cloud, Smog, etc.).
name: Defog

Description: You curl up into a tight ball, increasing your defensive stance. Until your next turn, you gain + 4 to your AC and have resistance to normal attacks.
name: Defense Curl

Description: You summon forth your underlings to form a natural shield in front of you. For the duration, as long as you keep your concentration, gain +1 to your AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The AC boost for this move changes to +2 at level 5, +3 at level 10, and +4 at level 17.
name: Defend Order

Description: You emit a powerful flash that damages all creatures in range. Creatures within 20 feet of you must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking fairy damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Dazzling Gleam

Description: You dangerously swing both arms at a creature in range, ignoring any positive stat changes the target is affected with. Make a melee attack, dealing dark damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Darkest Lariat

Description: You send the minds of your creatures into a world of darkness, damaging them before putting them to sleep. All creatures within 30 feet of you must make a WIS save against your Move DC, taking dark damage and falling asleep on a failure, or half as much without falling asleep on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Dark Void

Description: You target a creature with a dark aura filled with horrible thoughts. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing dark damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 17 or higher, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Dark Pulse

Description: You lash out at a target with vine or claw or blade. Make a melee roll on a target, doing on a successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Cut

Description: This Move has a different effect based on your creature type. If you are ghost-type: You attempt to put a curse on a creature. Force a target in range to make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, the target is cursed. You take damage initially and the target takes ghost damage at the end of each of its turns for the duration. If you are any other type: You place a curse on yourself. For the duration, your STR and CON scores increase by 2, but your DEX score decreases by 4.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Curse

Description: You clasp your hands around a creature for a crushing blow. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing normal damage and grappling the target on a hit. If the target is above 50% of its maximum health, add your proficiency bonus to the damage roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Crush Grip

Description: You strike out with powerful claws. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing normal damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, your next attack on the same target is rolled at advantage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Crush Claw

Description: You unleash a powerful blow that has a chance to temporarily lower a target's defense. Make a melee attack against a target, doing dark damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or higher, the target's AC is decreased by 1 for the remainder of combat. This decrease may be stacked, up to a maximum of -5 to AC.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Crunch

Description: You slash at a creature with a poisonous strike. Make a melee attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the attack is treated as a critical hit and the target is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Cross Poison

Description: You crush a creature with a strong sideways strike. Make a melee attack against a target, doing fighting damage on a hit. Cross Chop results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Cross Chop

Description: You summon forth a mysterious power that blocks an incoming status condition. When you or an ally within 5 feet of you are subject to a status condition from a move, you may use your reaction to nullify the condition.
name: Crafty Shield

Description: You slam down onto a creature with a heavy claw. Make a melee attack roll on a target, dealing water damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on rolls of 19 or 20.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Crabhammer

Description: You strike out with quick and sticky hands. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing normal damage on a hit. On a successful attack, you steal the creatures held item if you are not currently holding one.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Covet

Description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against the creature, doing fighting damage on a successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Counter

Description: You unleash spores of thick cotton that covers the target. Force a target in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target's speed is reduced by 10 for the duration. If this reduction in speed causes their speed to be 0, they are restrained for the duration.
name: Cotton Spore

Description: You protect yourself by wrapping your body up in thick, soft cotton. For the duration, boost your AC by +2.
name: Cotton Guard

Description: You call upon a mystic force to come to your aid. For the duration, you have advantage on all saving throws.
name: Cosmic Power

Description: You send a focused laser that scorches a 'Z' pattern on a target. Make a ranged attack, dealing dragon damage on a hit. On a hit, force the target to make a CON save against your Move DC, losing all effects of its abilities on a failure, until it is switched out.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
name: Core Enforcer

Description: You mimic a target that you can see, in range. When you activate this move, choose a target in range and fully execute the most recent move used by the creature, using your own ability scores, level, and typing for saving throw DC, attack, and damage.
name: Copycat

Description: Until the beginning of your next turn, take on a new type for resistances/vulnerabilities/immunities equal to one of the types of a move you currently know.
name: Conversion

Description: If you took damage from an attack since the end of your last turn, you may use a bonus action to change your type to any type that is resistant or immune to the type of move used against you. This effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Conversion 2

Description: You wrap yourself around a creature, trying to squeeze the life from them. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is grappled on your subsequent turns, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing normal damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Constrict

Description: You attempt to enter the mind of a target and cause confusion. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range. On a hit, the target takes psychic damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the target becomes confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Confusion

Description: You target a creature in range with a sinister ray of ghostly light. Make a ranged attack against a creature. On a hit, they become confused.
name: Confuse Ray

Description: You whisper an untold secret into the mind of a creature in range. The target must make a WIS save against your Move DC, becoming confused on a failure.
name: Confide

Description: You strike out with a lightning fast punch. Make a melee attack roll. The target takes normal damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional normal damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Comet Punch

Description: You coil up and concentrate your power. For the duration, gain +1 to your attack rolls, damage rolls, and AC.
name: Coil

Description: You get in close for a devastating strike, sacrificing your defenses. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing fighting damage on a hit. After activating this move, the target has advantage on any attack it makes against you before the beginning of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Close Combat

Description: You throw a clump of special mud that has the power to remove all stat changes from a target. Make a ranged attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a hit, any stat changes affecting the target since the beginning of battle are reset.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Clear Smog

Description: You slam your scaled hands together to create an intense, sound-based shockwave in a 30 foot cone in front of you. Any creature caught in the blast must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking dragon damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail the save by 5 or more reduce their AC by 1 for the remainder of combat.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Clanging Scales

Description: You clamp down on a target, attempting to deal damage and keep them in place. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes water damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to pry itself away with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is grappled on your subsequent turns, this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit, dealing water damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
name: Clamp

Description: You swing the target around and throw it as hard as you can, away from the battlefield. Make a melee attack, dealing fighting damage on a hit. In wild battles, the target takes the damage and flees from battle if its level is lower than that of the user. In trainer battles, the target takes the damage and must be immediately switched out for another creature in the trainer's party, if any remain.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Circle Throw

Description: You wait for an opening, striking with speed when the moment is right. Ignoring any boosts to the AC of a target, make a melee attack, dealing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Chip Away

Description: You shout a series of disorienting words at a creature, scrambling their senses. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, deal flying damage and cause the target to become confused.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Chatter

Description: You attempt to charm a creature, sharply decreasing its attack. A target you choose in range must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, the target adds -2 to all attacks against you for the duration.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The target adds -3 at level 5, -4 at level 10, and -5 at level 17.
name: Charm

Description: Electricity surges through your body, charging up for your next attack. Until your next turn, boost your AC by 2. On your next turn, double your STAB bonus when dealing damage of your type.
name: Charge

Description: You send a beam of electric energy at a creature that has a chance to power you up. Make a ranged attack, dealing electric damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 10 or higher and the attack hits, double your MOVE modifier for the damage of this move and any other move you activate before the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
name: Charge Beam

Description: You attempt to charm a creature into pulling its punches. When hit by an attack from a creature of the opposite gender, you may use a reaction to force it to make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a failure, the attack does not hit.
name: Captivate

Description: You blend in with your surroundings, taking on a new type for resistances/vulnerabilities/immunities. The type is dependent on the terrain, and up to the DMs discretion. (Ex: Forest = Grass, Beach = Water, Desert = Ground/Fire, Mountain = Rock, etc.)
name: Camouflage

Description: You clear your mind of all distractions. For the duration, double your STAB bonus when dealing damage of your type.
name: Calm Mind

Description: You use up all the fire energy you have to inflict massive damage in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. Creatures within the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC. On a failure, the creature take fire damage and become burned. On a success, they take half as much damage without being burned. After using this move, the user burns itself out and loses its fire-typing for the remainder of combat. Dual-type fire Pokemon change to their single other type, and single-type Pokemon become typeless, losing STAB and all vulnerabilites, resistances, and immunities.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Burn Up

Description: Your fire a series of high-speed seeds at a creature. Make a ranged attack roll, doing grass damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional grass damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Bullet Seed

Description: You strike with a punch that is quick as a bullet. Choose a target within 10 feet of you. You rush forward to slam a fist into the creature, avoiding all attacks of opportunity. Make a melee attack on that creature, dealing steel damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.
name: Bullet Punch

Description: You strike the ground so hard that it ripples out from you in a 30 foot circle. Any creature caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking ground damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Raised creatures are immune to the effects and damage of this move.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Bulldoze

Description: You pump yourself up, increasing your adrenaline. For the next minute, choose to add +1 to your attack rolls OR +1 to AC. This move can be stacked to a maximum of +5 for either choice.
name: Bulk Up

Description: You vibrate your wings, creating a harsh sound that damages any creature in range. All creatures within 20 feet of you must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking bug damage on a fail. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, they have disadvantage on their next attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Bug Buzz

Description: You lash out and bite a target. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing bug damage on a hit. If the target is holding a berry when you hit, you immediately eat it and gain its effect.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Bug Bite

Description: You shoot a series of quickly moving bubbles at a target. Make three ranged attacks, doing water damage on each successful hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d8 at level 5, 2d6 at level 10, and 3d6 at level 17.
name: Bubble

Description: You shoot a concentrated stream of bubbles at a single creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit. On natural attack rolls of 19 or 20, the target's speed is halved until the end of their next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Bubble Beam

Description: You swing your arms around violently, attacking anything within a 10 foot circle, centered on yourself. All creatures in range must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking dark damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Brutal Swing

Description: You send a harsh blast of salt water at a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature, dealing water damage on a hit. If the target has less that 50% of its max HP, double the damage dealt.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Brine

Description: You strike out with a powerful and focused punch. Make a melee attack roll on a creature, doing fighting damage on a hit. This move ignores the effects of moves that would reduce its damage (Harden, Reflect, etc.)
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Brick Break

Description: You tuck in your wings and dive at a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing flying damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the total (rounded down) in typeless recoil damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Brave Bird

Description: When you activate this move, you use 10 feet of your movement to bounce upwards and disappear, remaining in an invulnerable state until your next turn. During this time, you are immune to the damage and effects of any move. If you have no remaining movement or are grappled/restrained before activating this move, the move fails. On your next turn, as an action, you reappear and attempt to slam down on top of a creature. Make a melee attack roll on a creature in range, with advantage, doing flying damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or more, the target is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
name: Bounce

Description: You create a deafening, explosive sound that damages all creatures within 20 feet of you. Force any creature in range to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking normal damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Boomburst

Description: You throw a boomerang and make two ranged attacks against a target. On each successful hit, do ground damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 2d4 at level 10, and 3d4 at level 17.
name: Bonemerang

Description: You rush forward to deliver a series of hard hits against a target. Make a melee attack roll, doing ground damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, you may immediately hit again for an additional ground damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
name: Bone Rush

Description: You strike a creature with a club of bone, doing ground damage on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Bone Club

Description: You send down a powerful strike of lightning from the heavens, surrounding an area of the battlefield with surging electricity. Any creature caught in a 20 foot radius, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking electric damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it becomes paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Bolt Strike

Description: You thrust yourself towards a creature in an attempt to crush them with your physical size. Make a melee attack on a target. On a hit, the target takes normal damage, and must succeed on a STR saving throw against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Body Slam

Description: You unleash an intense and beautiful line of blue flames in a 50 foot line, 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the line must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, they are burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Blue Flare

Description: If a creature within range attempts to flee or switch out, you may use your reaction to stop it dead in its tracks, keeping this from happening.
name: Block

Description: Icy clouds form overhead and pelt the ground with hail and snow, centered on a point you choose within range. Each creature in a 30 ft radius, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking ice damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Targets that fail the save by 5 or more become frozen.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 6d6 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Blizzard

Description: Flames burst from your feet as you deliver a powerful kick. Make a melee attack on a creature, doing fire damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target is burned. This move scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
name: Blaze Kick

Description: Explosive projectiles rain down upon creatures in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Any creature caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking fire damage on a fail and half as much on a success. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Blast Burn

Description: You sink your teeth into a target creature. Make a melee attack roll, doing dark damage on a successful hit. On natural attack rolls of 19 or 20, the target flinches
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
name: Bite

Description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns, it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. While a creature is grappled, you may continue this move, as a bonus action, to do an automatic normal damage without having to make an attack roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Bind

Description: You embrace the damage done to you, waiting for your time to strike. Use your attack action to activate this move, and keep track of all damage done to you before your next turn. On your next turn, you use your action to lash out at a target with a normal ranged attack, striking them for double the amount of typeless damage you took on a successful hit. At 10th Level, you can choose to hold Bide for a second turn for the chance to add additional damage to the attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: You may continue to stockpile damage for 2 turns at level 10 and above.
name: Bide

Description: As a bonus action, you may pass your held item to a willing creature in range, if the target is not currently holding an item.
name: Bestow

Description: You sacrifice health for attack. When using this move, decrease your current HP by half your maximum, but increase your Strength score by 10 while you remain in battle. The effect ends if your current HP rises above half your maximum.
name: Belly Drum

Description: You let out a damaging belch at a creature in range. Force the creature to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking poison damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If you are holding a berry when activating this move, you may consume it and force the target to automatically fail the saving throw.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
name: Belch

Description: You use strength in numbers to attack a creature. Make a melee attack on a creature, and an additional attack for any other conscious creature your trainer is currently carrying, dealing dark damage on each hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to  at level 5,  at level 10, and  at level 17.
name: Beat Up

Description: You heat up your beak and strike out at a target. When you activate this move, you spend your action to charge up your beak. If you are hit with a melee attack before the action of your next turn, the target is burned. On your next turn, spend an action to make a melee attack on a creature, dealing flying damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
name: Beak Blast

Description: As a bonus action, you may switch out, passing along all negative status effects or stat changes to the new creature. This includes existing battle effects from moves such as Substitute, Swords Dance, Ingrain, Aqua Ring, etc. Effects from moves that require concentration may also be transferred, with concentration now dependent on the new creature.
name: Baton Pass

Description: You create a transparent shield of psychic energy. While active, the barrier grants +2 to AC for you and any companions within 5 feet of you for the duration.
name: Barrier

Description: Make a ranged attack on a creature, rolling on a hit. You attack with a barrage of ranged strikes equal to the number shown. Each projectile deals normal damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: Each projectile that hits deals 1d6 at level 5, 2d4 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
name: Barrage

Description: You sense incoming danger and are able to quickly create a barrier to avoid it.  When targeted by an attack, you may automatically avoid taking damage on the first instance of this reaction. If Baneful Bunker was successful in avoiding' a melee attack, the attacker becomes poisoned.  On future instances of this move in the same combat, you must roll higher than a 15 on a d20 roll for the reaction to be successful.
name: Baneful Bunker

Description: You quickly widen your eyes in an attempt to charm a creature, decreasing their will to fight. When you or an ally in range are targeted by a Move that requires an attack roll, you may use a reaction to impose disadvantage on the roll.
name: Baby-Doll Eyes

Description: You send forth a heap of powerful snow to pummel a creature. Make a ranged attack on a target, dealing ice damage on a hit. If the target has dealt any damage to you since the end of your last turn, double the damage you deal.
